335b5(mdo 'grel): spyod yul yin// 'di dag byed sems ma gtags pa// gzhan gyi sems kyi spyad yal yan// ye shes kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so// rgya chen
335b6(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' kun gnas pa'i// dus gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// kun gyi sems kyi spyod pa ni// gang gi kun du shes 'gyur ba// de ltar shes rab kyi ni tshogs// blo ldan byang chub sems dpa'
336a1(mdo 'grel): yis/ thob par bya ba de ni yang // spro ba chen po skye bar 'gyur// shes rab kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs gang gi/ byang chub sems la sogs bsdus pa//
336a2(mdo 'grel): sems ni dang po nas brtsams nas// byang chub snying po yi ni bar// bsag sa ste yang dag gzungs rnams dang // de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kun// yang dag blangs pa'i tshogs de ni// mi bza
336a3(mdo 'grel): yang dag blangs par brjod// yang dag blangs pa'i tshig gis so// brtson 'grus 'di kun mtha' dgra la// chos kyi bdag med bsgoms pa nyid// na mkha' bzhin du rnam dag 'gyur// gzhan du lta ba
336a4(mdo 'grel): ldan pas min// 'gro kun ngo bo nyid mud pas// dbang po drug ni rab bsdus nas// zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// 'di de rtag par bsgom pa'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi gtam mo// sgro ni rnams
336a5(mdo 'grel): ste le ba'i bsam gtan dang // de bzhin gnas pa'i bsam gtan mchog/ dbang 'byor dang gsum shes par bya// tshangs pa'i bde ba rab sgrub pa'o// rtog dang dpyod dang dga' ba dang // bde dang rtsi gcig
336a6(mdo 'grel): sems dang ni// yan lag lnga po 'di dag ldan// bsam gtan dang po rab tu skye// nong ni yongs su dang ba dang // dga' dang bde ba rtse gcig sems// rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag ldan// bsam gtan
336b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa la gnas gsungs// btang snyoms dang ni dran pa dang // shes bzhin bde ba rtse gcig sems// yan lag lnga po 'di dag ldan// bsam gtan gsum pa nyid du 'gyur// btang snyoms dran ldan
336b2(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal min// bde min pa nI myong ba ste// rtswa gcig sems ldan yan lag ni// bzhi ldan bsam gtan tha ma'o// yang na gzugs sogs spyod yul gyis// g.yed byi 'dod pa'i sdig ches ni//
336b3(mdo 'grel): ba zod dka' de rnams spangs pa yis// dben pa'i bsam gtan dang po ste// rtog dang dpyod pa gnyis po yis// shin du dben pa las skyes pa'i// dga' dang bde ba mtshungs ldan pa// bsam gtan
336b4(mdo 'grel): dang po mnyam par bzhug/ bsam gtan dang po'i rjes mthun gang // rtog pa nye bar brtags pa dang // shes dang mthong dang dpyod pa nyid// don gcig pa yi tshig rnams so// brtags pa de nyid la spyod/
336b5(mdo 'grel): dang / yongs su sbyor dang rjes su 'gro/ 'jug dang rnam dpyod kyang don gcig/ gnas pa nye bar rdzogs pa ste// yang dag myong ba legs skyod pa'o// de la gnas nas mthong ba'i lam// thob par
336b6(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i 'dun pa 'o thob// mthong lam 'dun pa thob nas ni// sngar gyi bsam gtan la mi chags// dang po las ni khyad 'phags pa'i// bsam gtan gnyis pa tshol bar byed// rtog pa dang ni dpyod pa
337a1(mdo 'grel): yi// sgrib pa rab tu 'joms pa yi// bsam gAtan gnyis pa thob pa ni// nAng yongs dang zhing sems kyi rgyun// gucig tu gyur pa'i blo de ni// dga' zhing bde bya'i bdag nyid do//
337a2(mdo 'grel): rtog dpyod nye bar zhi ba dang // nang ni yongs su dang bar gyur// rgyun ni gcig tu 'gyur zhes pa// 'di yang ro nyams gyur pa yi// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu bzhin du// ting nge 'dzin gyi ro gcig 'gyur// dga'
337a3(mdo 'grel): ba dkon mchog gsum la ste// de phyir de ni dben skyes byed// bsam gtan gnyis pa thob nas nI// de la gnas na slar yang ni// mi skye'i chos la bzod pa ni// thob par bya phyir thams cad du// 'dun
337a4(mdo 'grel): pa skye bo de nas ni// bsam gtan gnyis pa yong skyo nas// bsam gtan de bas bla med pa'i// bsam gtan gsum pa de tshol byed// bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sgrib pa ni// dga' ba yin te
337a5(mdo 'grel): dI sbyongs nas// bsam gtan ga sum pa thob pa ni// de bzhin dga' med badri ba'o// de bas ba sam du med 'di dag/ dga' ba med pa'i bde ba brjod// 'di dag mchog gyur ma yin te// zad
337a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos phyir de las yang // mi skye'i chos la bzod pa ni// thob par bya phyir de bzhin du// 'dun pa drag mchog mi bzad pa// blo ldan rnams la skye ba nyid// de ni bde yang ma chags pas// bsam
337b1(mdo 'grel): gtan bzhi pa thob 'gyur te// btang snyoms dran pa yongs su dag/ sdug min bde min zhi ba'o// bsam gtan 'di dag snyoms 'jug pas// de yi sems ni 'jam par 'gyur// dga' zhing shin tu dul
337b2(mdo 'grel): ba ste// brtan zhing dri nga la 'od gsal ba// lus can rnams kyi phon bde ba// skyed la rab tu / zhugs pa yi// skye ba med pa'i chos la ni// bzod pa snang ba skye bar 'gyur// de nas mchog tu
337b3(mdo 'grel): lhun grub cing // shin tu sbyangs pa'i lam la 'jug/ nyan thos la sogs lam dang ni// bsam gtan thun mong bu ru brjod// zag med rnam pa bcu drug rnam sI// byang chub sems dpa'i mya 'dres pa'o//
337b4(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan phyi rol phyin gsungs pA// nyan thos sogs kyi spyod yul mIna?// gzhung ni yang dag bsdus pa'i phyir// 'dir ni lung las ma brdebs so// 'di ni bsam gtan gyi gtam mo// /
337b5(mdo 'grel): thos bsam sgom las 'khrungs pa yi// shes rab gsal po ra thar pa'i blo// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams bcom pas// gnyis mad ye shes snang ba ste// gcig dang du ma las nges grol// dngos drang dngos
337b6(mdo 'grel): min rnam par spangs// rgyu dang 'bras bu las 'das pa// mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid las grol ba// dus gsum khams gsum shin tu 'das// kun rtog rten ni nges par spang // spros pa nyir zhi zhi ba ste// /
338a1(mdo 'grel): glu n+daHd+ham myed// gan du myad dang yang dag // na drum+bu bu mdzun byud// A sa chos sa bdug myed / ASh+Ta sa byu 'bras smra ba // 'don shA rab cho ga
338a2(mdo 'grel): mo// / rang gi skyon ni gzhim pa dang // sems can thams cad lam gzhug dang // myur du bde ba mngon rtogs byung // byab ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod// 'di ni thabs kyi gtam mo//
338a3(mdo 'grel): smon lam dbye ba gsum zhes pa// rang gi tshogs rgyun myi chad dang // 'gro ba'i don gyi rgyu dang ni// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyang ba'o zhes pa ni smon lam gyi gtam mo// // las kyi zlog
338a4(mdo 'grel): par byed pa dang // nyon mongs pa ni sel ba dang // rgol ba dang ni bdud dgra kun// bzlog pa'i stobs dong gsum zhus ga sungs zhes pa 'di ni stobs kyi gtam mo// // rtog dang rtog med mnyam
338a5(mdo 'grel): nyid do// sna drang rnam par mi rtog dang // sems can don thabs nges snang ste// ye shes gsum du dbye ba'o// zhes pa ni ye shes kyi gtam mo// sbyin pa la sogs 'di dag rnams//
338a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems ni sngon 'gro bas/ byams pa'i bsam pa mngon bsgoms rnams// slar yang phar phyin 'jig rten pa// 'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams so// dmigs pa'i yul ni gsum po
338b1(mdo 'grel): rnams// chos kyi bdag med bsgoms pa yis// de rnams 'jig rten 'dus par shes// de nyid rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can// 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so// byams pa'i bsam pa khyad
338b2(mdo 'grel): med kyang // chos kyi bdag med dang ldan pa'i// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin sogs rnams// yongs dag bya yi khyad par ro// 'di ni sa rnams kyi khyad par gyi rgyu'i// sbyin pos rab dgu'i rnal 'byor te//
338b3(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims ldan pas dri med 'gyur// bzod pas 'od byed brtson 'grus kyis// 'od 'phro 'di ni bsod na mos ldan// bsod nams las ni sbyong dka' ba// shes rab kyis ni mngon 'gyur mothong
338b4(mdo 'grel): ring du song ba thabs chen pos// stibs dang ldan pas mi g.yor 'gyur// smon lam gyis ni legs blo can// ye shes ldan pas chos kyi sprin// pha rol phyin pa bcu po ni// dag pa'i rim pas
338b5(mdo 'grel): sa bcu'o// gzhan yang 'dir// las kyi rdzu 'phrul sems dang tshe// bsod nams ye shes yo byad dang // chos dang ye shes dbang phyug nyid// stobs kyang bcu ste nan tan dang // spobs dang dang /
338b6(mdo 'grel): dang thos dang bsgom// yongs dag so sor brtag pa dang // bsod nams ye shes bzod pa'o// 'di ni dbang bcu stobs bcu dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bras bu dang
339a1(mdo 'grel): bcas pa'o// sa 'di rnams kyi dmigs pa ni// khyad par med do stong nyid do// chos dang gang zag bdag med kyi// mtshan nyid de bzhin gnyis med pa'o// de dang de yi rtog pa ni//
339a2(mdo 'grel): gzhom phyir de yi ngo bo dgongs// dngos su rtog pa'i dbye ba yis// rnam pa mtha' yas rnam par smin// 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las pha rol tu phyin pa bcu 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i le'u ste/
339a3(mdo 'grel): nyi shu rtsa gaucig pa'o// // blang bya dong ni dor bya'i cha// 'di ni mngon du shes dang ni// da dung ye shaMsA sar 'jug phyir// tshi ga yang dag rab basbyin bya// dI la 'jug pa mi sdug dang // dbug
339a4(mdo 'grel): rngub 'byung ba dran pa ste// de la chags can mi sdug pas// cha gos pa yongs su zad par byed// chags pu kha dog dbyibs dang nI// reg bya'i dri sogs yul yin no// mi sdug goms pas de zad de//
339a5(mdo 'grel): zhi gnas yang dag 'byung ba'o// rang lus sha dwe nga rul dang zags// rul pa'i dra ba tsam du bsam// de ni rim pas 'phel nas ni// sa ni gang po nyid du lta// dad mos 'phel phyir 'di gsungs te// slar
339a6(mdo 'grel): yang de bzhin bsdus nas ni// rang nyid la ni bsgom bya ste// rul pa yi ni lug rgyud du'o// bsgom pa'i dngos po gsal ba na// las dang po ni rdzogs pa'o// keng rus dang ni thod phyed par// gtang nges
339b1(mdo 'grel): sbyang ba byas pAr bshad// shin tu 'das nas yid byed pa// smin mtshams dkyil du sems bzung bya// rnam par spel dang sdu ba yi// rim pa nyid ni rnam par bsgom// mi sdug rnam gsum gsungs pa ni//
339b2(mdo 'grel): dman dong 'bring sogs dbye ba nyid// mi 'dod bdag nyid rang bzhin ni// de ni chags pa'i gnyen po ste// mi sdug bsgom pa gsum pa'o// 'di ltar lus la yang dag brtig/ so dang skra dang srin mo skye
339b3(mdo 'grel): khrag dang pags pa sha dang ni// rdul drang tshil dang zhag chu ser// rgyus pa rkang dang mcher pa dang // snying rus mkhri sa glo mchin pa dang // pho ba rgyu ma zhag dang ni// glang pa dang ni mig rnag dang // phyi sa dang
339b4(mdo 'grel): bad kan dang // rnabs dang mchi mu gcin dang ni// mchil mA dang ni khu bu dang // srin bu nAg sogs de dag gI/ phung po lA ni lus zhes brjod// dri ma ngan dang mi sdug dang // rang dbang med pa'i rang bzhin nyid//
339b5(mdo 'grel): mngon sum mi gtsang bsdus pa ni// don med kun gyi snod yin no// 'dri la chags te bzlog dka' ba// ma rig pas bsgribs ya mtshan che// gi pur la sogs dri bzangs dang // gang dang 'grogs pas
339b6(mdo 'grel): brlag par 'gyur// 'o de ltar dur khrod sa dbus su// song nas shi ba'i ro la ni// blta zhing rang gi gnyen gyis spong // gzhan yang 'jigs pa byed pas so// rlung gis shin tu g.yengs pa ste// rnam pa
340a1(mdo 'grel): bsngos shing rnam par gzegs// phyed zos pa dang 'bu yis ni// rab tu mngon par gzhig pa nyid// sha med rnam par gtsigs pa dang // rus pa kang rus rang bzhin nyid// rnam par 'thor ba mthong
340a2(mdo 'grel): nas ni// mkhas pas rang gi lus dang mnyam// de ltar mi sdug yang dag par// bsgoms pa yis ni mi 'chags 'gyur// de yis zhi gnas rdzogs pa ste// de ni bsgom pa'i snod yin no// 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam
340a3(mdo 'grel): lha 'jug pa las mi sdug pa bsgom pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsi gnyis pa'o// / rtog dpyod mang na dbugs rngub dang // dbugs 'byung dran pas brtan par bya// thams cad du ni sems bsdus te// de bas
340a4(mdo 'grel): srog la dmigs pa me chog/ 'jug pa'am ni 'byung ba yi// srog gi rlung ni bgrang bar bya// drin pa tsam du gcig laM sogs// gcig becu'i mthar bgrang slar-I dI bzhin// gal te bar du g.yongs na ni// slab
340a5(mdo 'grel): yang de ni bgrang bya// sems ni 'dus dang g.yengs pa dang // chad dang lhag pas ma yin// yang na dbugs 'byung la sogs rung // 'gro ba rtag tu rjes 'gro ba// ji tsam ring bar 'jug pa dang // 'byung ba yang ni
340a6(mdo 'grel): sems kyis brtog/ gzhag pa zhes bya sna rtse ni// rkang sor mthar ni yang dag gnas// nor bu'i phag pa bzhin du ni// rtse gcig sems kyis bsam par bya// ci 'di rjes su mthun pa'am// nyi bar 'joms
340b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i rlung rnams zhes// dbugs rngub 'byung ba dran pa bsgom// zhi gnas dang ni nad med rgyu// bgrang dang rjes 'gro 'jog pa dang // rtog pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang // yongs su dag dang drug 'di ni// das rngub dbugs
340b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung dran par 'dod// 'dir ni gzhung bsdus 'dod pas ni// rnam pa gsum ni rnam par phye// drug po rnams las gang rung bas// yang dag 'dod dor 'grub pa yin// 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las
340b3(mdo 'grel): dbugs 'jug pa dang 'byung ba dang bgrang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // zhi gnas rdzogs par byas pa las// dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom pa ni// lus dang tshor sems dang chos// mtshan nyid bral ba
340b4(mdo 'grel): yongs su bsgom// lus 'di yang ni brtags pa tsam// don de bzhin du brten pa med// yul gcig na med thams cad kyi// cha la yang ni mi gnas so// ldag pa la sogs gcig la yang // lus kyi blo ni kye mi
340b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// tshwa shas las gzhan lus kyi blo// gang la nges pa skye mi 'gyur// cha shas rnams ni lus nyid na// 'di dag ma lus lus su 'gyur// phyogs kyi cha yis rnam phye bas// phra rab rdul yang cha dang ldan// cha ji snyed
340b6(mdo 'grel): ni gcig min te// de bas du ma nyid kyi min// gcig dang du ma rnam bral gang // dngos med na mkha'i me tog bzhin// drug gis cig car sbyar ba na// phra rab rdul yang drug char 'gyur// drug po dag ni gau gcig na//
341a1(mdo 'grel): gong bu rdul phran tsam du 'gyur// de bas na ni ngo bo nyid// med kyang lus kyi blo skye dang // thog med ma rig pa lngas 'byung // 'jig tshogs lta bar rab tu skye// lus mi srid na mig la sogs// srid pa yang ni shin du ring // de
341a2(mdo 'grel): phyir mig sogs 'dus reg las// 'byung ba'i tshor ba ga la yod// gzung bya'i dngos medo sems de med// de phyir 'dzin pa po ma srid// bzung nga 'di pa cwo yasas 'dzin pa go la zhig/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba yi// phung po skye mched khams
341a3(mdo 'grel): rnams nI// rten cing 'brel pa'i spyod yul rnams// thad skye med do nyid// dngos po rang las ma skyes te// don med phyir te de mi srid// rdzogs par skye bar 'gyur ba nI// slar ya nga rgyu nyid du ni 'ogyur// gang tshe rgyu nyid 'bras bu na//
341a4(mdo 'grel): de yi rgyu ni so so ru// kha dog da byibs dang ro nus pa// rnam par smin par mi 'gyuraro// snga ma'i gzugs ni yongs spangs nas// phyi ma'i gzugs ni yongs 'dzin pa// de yi ngo nyid ji ltar yin// de phyir ri nga nyid las mu skye
341a5(mdo 'grel): rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis gcig par// 'jig rten pa yang mi rtog go/ grang phyir rgyu du nyams nas kyang // 'bras bur gsal ba mi mthong ste// de bas 'jig rten du mi rigs// de kho na nyid du yang min// rang las skyes pa'i phyo ga/
341a6(mdo 'grel): 'di ni// dpag tu med pa'i skyon du 'gyur// gzhan las kyang ni mi skye ste// gzhan nyid la ni khyed med na// dngos po kun las dngos po kun// skye ba du ni 'gyur ba'o// gang las gang ni skye bar 'gyur// rjesu 'gro las ldog
341b1(mdo 'grel): dang // pha rol nyid las khyad med kyang // gang las gang ni skye 'gyur ba// de nyid de yi rgyu yin na// gang las de nyid skye 'gyur ba// de dag nyid ni gang na ste// gang ste mthong phyir zhe na min// gang phyir sgyu mas ma nges nyid// shA lu ka sogs las kyang ni/
341b2(mdo 'grel): shU lu ka skyes ci las kyang // skye mthong ra las mda'o mthong ste// sa bdag pa las pad+ma'o// rang nyid grub nos gzhan 'byung ste// gzhan grub nas ni rang nyid 'dod// de gnyis bltos nas grub pa ste// pha rol tshu rol bzhin du gsungs//
341b3(mdo 'grel): gi nyis ka las kyang skye min te// skyon ni gnyis ka 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyu med las kyang rigs min te// kun tu rab tu thal 'gyur te// rgyu gzhan la ni mi bltos phyir// rtag tu yod dang med par 'gyur// bltos pa yi ni dngos po rnams// ris 'ag
341b4(mdo 'grel): ba nyid du ni 'gyur// de ngos rnams yod pa skye min te// rang nyid thib phyir don med nyid// skyes pa yang ni skye ba na// de ni thug pa med par 'gyur// dngos rnas med pa skye min te// ri bI rA sogs ji bzhino// thi nyid las 'di dag kun// rtag par skye bA rab tu thal/
341b5(mdo 'grel): yod dang ming las maM skye ste// 'gal ba'i phyir na mi smi do// gnyis ka min las mi skye ste// de lto'i don mi srid phyir// lus la sogs rnam+ba ji tsam bzhin// dbu ma rtsa bI la sogasu// gsungs pa gang de yongs shes bya// bsdus pa'i phyir na 'dir ma brjod//
341b6(mdo 'grel): gang gang cung zad gang gi tshe// gang du de ltar nyid snang ba// de kun nga tshed ru ni// de lha nyi du rab tu med// de phyir gang la gang gzugs kyis// ji srid cung zad rab rdogan// de yi gzugasakyi de stong ste// sgyu mI grong khyer sbrul bzhi no// 'di ltararo lus li sog pa ni da nyid med rna bsgos pa// de ladi
342a1(mdo 'grel): nyid med pa'i// rang bzhin nyid du dran pa skye// thos bsam sogs kyi shes rab ni// dran pa'o de las nye bar 'jog/ nye bar bzhag pa'o lus la sogs// 'di dag dbye ba rnam pa bzhi// phyin ci log
342a2(mdo 'grel): bzhi po yi// gnyen po ye ni ngo bo nyid// gtsang sogs 'khrul pa gzhom pa nyid// bzhi po 'di dag dbye ba'o// ji ltar gsungs pa'i dran nyer bzhag/ bsgoms pa byas te legs par gnas// mdor na lus la sogs pa ni// mi rtag
342a3(mdo 'grel): sogasu blta bar bya// de nas drod du 'gyur zhes pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal la sogs bden bzhi ni// rnam pa bcu drug spyod yul lo// gtsub shing gtsubs pa la sogs pas// ji ltar phyi rol mi 'byung
342a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin// yang dag shes pa'i me las ni// 'byung ba'i rtags ni dang po brjod// mngon shes la sogs bcos pa yi// rnam pa nye bar mtshon pa ste// lus sogs las su rung dang zhi// mngon par shes sogs yon tan yang //
342a5(mdo 'grel): chung dang 'bring dang chen po ste// de ni rim pas skye bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor shin tu dad pa yis// bden pa nyid du shin tu bsgom de las de yi mi mthun phyogs// skyes pa rnams ni spong bar byedab slar yang de dag mi skyed
342a6(mdo 'grel): cing // kun tu skyes pa 'joms par byed// gnyen po'i phyogs rnams ma skyes pa// bskyed phyir yang dag 'bad par byed// skyes pa rnams ni nan tan gyis// bsrung zhing yongasu 'phel bar byed// bdun pa bskyed
342b1(mdo 'grel): cing brtson 'grus ni// rtsom ste thub pa'i sras kyis so// brtan pas yang dag spong ba ni// bzhi po 'di dag bsgom par bya'o// de nas rtse mor gyur zhes pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur// de 'phel ba las skyes de ni// spong ba'i
342b2(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus ldan pa zhes// gsungs pa'i brtson 'grus can la ni// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa 'di dag 'byung // 'dun dong brtson 'grus sems dang ni// dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin 'di dag go/ 'dun pa drag po'i stobs ldan
342b3(mdo 'grel): bas/ dge ba'i chos ni rnam bsgoms pas// de la rtse gcig sems kyis ni// ting 'dzin nye bar skye bar 'gyur// yang dag spong ba'i brtson 'grus de// yang dag ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de yi bdag rkyen brtson
342b4(mdo 'grel): 'grus kyi// ting 'dzin nye bar skye bar 'gyur// sems skyong ldan pa yi ni sems// de kho na nyid grwa cig pu'i sems// sems ni bdag pos ma skyed par// de la ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur// da lta bdag la sdigs
342b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos// yod pa nyid dam 'on te med// dpyod pa zhes pa'i ting 'dzin gyi// rgyal por sems ni rtse gcig 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi// rkang pa'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams so// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po//
342b6(mdo 'grel): dag/ gsungs pa 'di dag ting 'dzin te// 'di la bzod par 'gyur zhes pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag bstan// chos kun mngon par 'dod par 'gyur// bzod
343a1(mdo 'grel): thob ngan song mi 'gro zhing // rgyal bas byang chub lung ston 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sras ni sems bskyed nas// grangs med bskal pas nges 'byung 'gyur// dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang // de bzhin ting
343a2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin shes rab bcus// dbang po lnga ste mthong lam gyi// skyed pa yi ni bdag po nyid// bden dung dkon mchog dag sogs la// dang drang ye shes bdag nyid de// de yang rnam pa gsum du 'dod// dad dang yod nyid nus
343a3(mdo 'grel): bapa nyid// lde lo don med brtson pa dang // yi chad pa dang zhum bdag nyid// de dag gnyen po brtson 'grus te// dge la spro ba'i mtshan nyid do// dran pa dus gsum sa la ni// sems ni nyams pa med pa'i//
343a4(mdo 'grel): sems rtse gcig pa'i chos la ni// ting nge 'dzin du yongs su brjod// shes rab thos bsam las byung zhing // chos rab 'byed pa'i bdag nyid do// 'di dag sngon du skyes kyang ni// rim pa 'dis ni rgyas pa'o//
343a5(mdo 'grel): de nas chos mchog de bzhin nyid// zhes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung // 'jig rten pa yi chos kun gyi// mchog nyid phyir ni de bzhin brjod// dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams su// rim pas 'phel ba nyid
343a6(mdo 'grel): du 'gyur// bzod pa chos mchog la gnas te// dang pa la sogs stobs ldan pa// gang tshe lha dang bdud dang ni// nyon mongs kun gyis thub dka' zhing // ting 'dzin grangs las 'das pa ni// zla
343b1(mdo 'grel): ldan la ni skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni nges par 'byed pa yi// chu ban+d+ha ru ni brjod pa sim// rlung dang 'bring stsogs dbye bu yis// b+hu dang so sor dge ba yis// tha dad so so'i dge ba gsum// 'di dag sbyor ba'i lam du
343b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ tshogs kyis ni zhes kyang ngo // de bzhin so so'i skye ba'i sa// mngon par dga' ba rin chen 'ong // 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sbyor lam brjod pa'i lde'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// /
343b3(mdo 'grel): dang ni byang chub sems dpa' yi// mthong ba'i lam ni brjod par bya// yang dag de nyid yang dag mthong // mi mthun phyogs ni spong bar 'gyur// ma thong lam de yi dri ma ni// rtsa ba'i bag la nyal drug ste//
343b4(mdo 'grel): chags drang khong khro du rgyal lta// mya rig the tshom zhes nyon mongs// 'dod chags la yang rnam gnyis te// 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags gang // de ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mchog/ gzugs dang gi zugs med
343b5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa ni// srid pa'i chags pa'o lta ba ni// bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang // med dang dman la mchog lta dang // rgyu min lam min der lta bu// de rnams lta ba lnga yin no// nyon mongs bcu ni khams
343b6(mdo 'grel): gsum du// brgyad cu rtsa brgyad du dbye ste// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams kyis// lta ba 'di dag slar yang spangs// gang 'di 'dod par spyod pa yi// sdug bsngal bden pa yid byed na//
344a1(mdo 'grel): mi rtag sdug bsngal sdud pa dang // bdag med rnam par skye bar 'gyur// sdug la chos shes bzod pa dang // sdug bsngal la chos shes 'di gnyis// 'dod pa'i chu zan nyon mongs gang //
344a2(mdo 'grel): sngar bstan de rnams kun spong byed// de bzhin gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i// sring po'i sdug bsngal ba den bsgom pas// sdug bsngal rjes su shes bzod dang // de shes pa ni yang dag skye// gzugs dang gzugs/
344a3(mdo 'grel): med nyon mongs ni// de nyid khong khro ma gtogs pa// rab tu 'joms te so so ru// rnam pa dgu gnyis bco brgyad do// 'di ltar khams gsum nyon mongs ni// sdug bsngal bden pa mthong ba yis// skad
344a4(mdo 'grel): cig bzhi po 'di nyid kyis// nyi shu rtsa brgyad rab tu spong // 'dod pa'i kun 'byung bden pa ni// rgyu dang kun 'byung dang yang ni// rab tu skye dang de bzhin rkyen// rnam pa bzhir ni yid la bya// kun 'byung la chos shes bzod/
344a5(mdo 'grel): dang // de shes pa ni yang dag skye// tshul khrims brtul zhugs 'jigs tshogs lta// mthar 'dzin lha rnams ma rtogs pa// 'dod chags khong khro ba rgyal dang // ma rig the tshom 'di dag dang // log lta lta ba
344a6(mdo 'grel): mchog 'dzin te/ 'dod pa'i bdun rnams zad par 'gyur// gzugs dang gzugs med gyur pa yi// kun 'byung bden pa bsgoms pa las// kun 'byung la rjes shes bzod dang // de shes pa ni rab tu
344b1(mdo 'grel): // gzugs dang bzhugs med nyon mongs ni// khong khro ma gtogs rab 'joms te// so sor drug drug bcu gnyis so// de lta khams gsum nyon mongs rnams// kun+da 'byung bden pa mthong ba lAs/
344b2(mdo 'grel): skung cig ban po 'di dag ni// nyid kyis bcu dgu bang par byed// 'gog dang dang de bzhin du// gya rnam pa dang nges 'byung ste// 'gog pa'i bden pa 'dod pa de// rnam pa bzhi 'di yidal
344b3(mdo 'grel): bya/ 'gog la chos shes bzod pa dang // de shis yang dag skyes pa las// gang de kun 'byung du gsungs rnams// nyon mong sa bdun ni rab tu spong // blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' gang //
344b4(mdo 'grel): gzugs dang gzugs med khams phyin nas// slar yang 'gog pa'i bden pa ni// yid la byas pa de la ni// 'gog la rjes shes bzod pa dang // de shes yang dag skyes pa las// gzugs dang gzug
344b5(mdo 'grel): med srid nyon mongs// rnams ni so sor drug rim bzhin// gnyis por de ltar bcu gnyis te// khams gsum por ni skad cig bzhi'i// 'gog bden de ni mthong ba la// bcu
344b6(mdo 'grel): dgu rab tu spong ba'o// lam gyi bden pa bsgom pa ni// 'dod pa'i khamasu rnam pa bzhi// lam dang nges par 'byin pa dang // rig pa sgrub pa'i rang bzhin las// lam la'ang chos shes bzod pa dang //
345a1(mdo 'grel): de shes yang dag skye sa pa lus// tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin dang // bcas pa brgyad mi 'dod pa'i'o// gzugs dang gzugs med gyur pa ni// de bzhin lam bden bsgoms
345a2(mdo 'grel): pa las// gzhan yang lAm la rjes shes pa'i// bzod dang de shes skyes pa las// gzugs dang gzugs med gyur pa ni// bdun bdun de ni bcu bzhi'o// de ltar khams gsum nyon mongs rnams// lam gyi bdes
345a3(mdo 'grel): pa mthong ba las// skad cig bzhi po 'di yis ni// nyi shu rtsa gnyis rab tu spong // 'di dag gis ni byang sems kyi// mthong ba'i lam ni rab tu skye// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams// de ltar mthong ba'i
345a4(mdo 'grel): lam de nyid// nyon mongs pa ni brgyad cu brgyad// bden pa yis ni rab 'joms so// 'gro kun ngo bo meng pa ste// gzugs brnyan da mtshungs gsal ba'o// dag cing gnyis myed na mkha' mnyam// de nyid de/
345a5(mdo 'grel): nas mthong bar 'gyur// mthong lam du ni bden mthong ba'i// bden pa'i rgya mtsho skye ba'o// mthu dang sems can don dang ni// ting 'dzi nA ya na tan mtha' yAs ldan+da// dran dang chos rab 'byed pa yis// shes
345a6(mdo 'grel): rab brtson 'gras gong du brjod// dga' bsems las byung bar gsungs// shin tu sbyangs pa lus bde ste// snyoms par gnas pa'i btang snyoms so// ting 'dzin sems ni rtse gcig pa'o// byang chub
345b1(mdo 'grel): yan lag bdun ldan pa'i// chos 'di dag ni zag pa med// de nas kun bden mi 'gyur bu'i// ting 'dzin de nas de la skye// dbu ni bcad nas sbyin byed kyang // sdug bsngal bar ni mi 'gyur ro// de ltar dag
345b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i sa de la// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rjesu 'brang // byang chub sems dpas dang po yi// mchog tu dga' ba thob pa nyid// 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las mthong lam+ba brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu r+dz+dza wa
345b3(mdo 'grel): pa'o// // de nas yang ni bsgom pa'i lam// theg pa gsum la rjes gnas pa'i// phra zhing phra ba'i dri ma ni// zad byed 'bad pas bsgom par bya// mthong ba'i don gyi de nyid la/ sems kyis
345b4(mdo 'grel): yang yang bskyed cing bsgom// goms nas thar pas 'gro ba'i lam// chung dang 'bring dang chen po ste// sgrar yang gsum du dbye ba ni// chung ngu'i chung ngu chung dro'i 'bring // chung ngu yin chen po dang // de bzhin
345b5(mdo 'grel): 'bring dang chen po yang // 'dod pa'i sar ni dgu rudu b+he// bskum gtan gzugs myed snyoms 'jug gi/ sa brgyad pa la de bzhin no// so so so so'i sa la ni// dgu dgu yi ni rnam par 'gyur// 'di ltar
345b6(mdo 'grel): sgom la khams gsum du// brgyad cu rtsa gcig de bye ba ni// mi mthun spang bya las phye ba// chags dang khong khro nga rgyal dang / ma rig bag la nyal 'di bzhi// 'dod pa'i khams kyi mi mthun phyogs// bsgom
346a1(mdo 'grel): pas spang bar bya rnams so// de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su ni/ khong khro ma gtogs gsum de nyid// gsum ni gzugs med kham su ste// bcu po 'di ni khamus gsum du'o// chung
346a2(mdo 'grel): du'i 'bring dang chen po ni// slar yang gsum du dbye ba ste// chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba nI/ dgu ru 'dod pa sa rnams su'o// bsdam ga tAn gzugs med saM bA rgya du la// mi mthun phyogs ni dgu dgu'o//
346a3(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa la sogs sa dgu lnga// rnam pa brgyad cu rtse gcig 'gyur// la ma la bzlog po'i rim pa nyid// chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs kyis// chen po'i tshe sogs dI ma spong // gsu ngus pa'i mthong dang bsgom
346a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i lam// mthong ba zhes ni gsungs pa dung // sgom lam zhes pa la rten nas// nyan thos sogs kyi tshul gyis ni// sa brgyad po ni thob par 'gyur// de yang rigs kyi sa dang po// gnyis pa de bzhin
346a5(mdo 'grel): brgyad pa ste// mthong ba zhes bya gsum pa'o// bzhi pa de bzhin 'asrabs pa'i sa// lnga pa 'dod chags bral zhes pa// drug pa byas pa bsrung pa ste// bdun pa nyan thos zhes pa'o// brgyad pa de bzhin
346a6(mdo 'grel): rang rgyal so// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub kyi// lam zhugs pa la gsungs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' shes bya ni// dri ma ming sogs sa dgu ste// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad po dang // mtshungs
346b1(mdo 'grel): par ldan pa bsgom pa'i lam// lta bu rtog pa dag dngu las// 'tshe ba dang ni rtsol ba dang // dran pa ting 'dzin yang dag ldan// lam gyi yan lag brgyad por shes// gnyis pa dri ma kun zang phyir// tshul khrims
346b2(mdo 'grel): pha rol phyin dag pa// ston ka'i zla 'od dang mtshu dus so// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin dag pa// gsum pa 'ong byed pa yang ni// ye shes me lce rab 'bar bas// 'dzin pa gnyis ni legs par blo sregs// bzhi pa
346b3(mdo 'grel): 'od 'phro ba yang ni// yang dag ye shes 'od 'phro'i phyir// brtson 'grus pha rol lhag cing // byang chub phyogs kyis rgyan du byas// lnga pa rgyal bar dka' ba yang // bdud kun gyis thub shi mu tra dka' nga/ bsam
346b4(mdo 'grel): gtan phar phyin gyis bcings pa// bsod nams tshogs kyi bsgrubs pa nyid// drug po mngon du 'gyuraro zhes pa// sangs rgyas chos la mngon phyogs nyid// shes rab pha rol phyin dgu pa// 'gog pa'i bden
346b5(mdo 'grel): pa tho ba ste rgyas// bdun pa ring song thabs chen po// rjes su rang du song ba'i phyir// blo ldan skad cig skad cig der// 'gog pa ya da ni thob d+ha 'gyur// de bzhin brgyud pa mi g.yo'i phyir// bzhonA nu'i sA ste/
346b6(mdo 'grel): mi g.yo ba// smon lam rnam par dag pa'i sa// 'gog las rgyal ba skul byed pa'o// dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros zhes// bgyi ba'i sa ste stobs la brten// 'dir ni br-i ldan legs pa yi// blo gros so sor rig
347a1(mdo 'grel): pa thob// bcu pa chos kyi sbyin yang ni// dam chos char ni mngon par 'bebs// 'dir nI byang sems dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dag par byed // 'di ni rgyul ba'i lam la 'jug pa las
347a2(mdo 'grel): sgrom lam brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtswa drug pa'o// // lam gzhan kun la khyad 'phags shing // rtse mo nyid du phyi paM las// khyud por la ma du grags pa yong // sa ni bocu bcu nang du'o// sangs rgyas
347a3(mdo 'grel): zhing dang mngon shes dang // dmu pa'i bsod nams ye shes chogs// rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyogs kyi chos// rnams dang zhi gnas lhag mthong bcas// gzugs dang spobs pa rnams dang ni// sha la sogs pa'i spyan
347a4(mdo 'grel): lnga dang / 'di dag la sogs chos rnams kun// thams cad du ni yongs su sbyong // 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las khyad par gyi lam bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // sa 'di rnams kyi sgru
347a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i lam// 'phags pa mi pham zhabs kyis ni// mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan du gsungs// yongs su sbyong ba rnam bcu yis// sa ni dang po 'thob 'gyur te// bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang // sems can rnams la semos
347a6(mdo 'grel): mnyam nyid// gtong dang bshes gnyen bsten pa dang // dam chos dmigs pa tshol ba dang // rtog tu nges 'byung sems nyid dang // sangs rgyas bkur 'dod dga' ba dang // chos ston pa dang bden pa yi// tshig ni bcu
347b1(mdo 'grel): pa yin par 'dod// 'di dag rang bzhin mi dmigs pas// yongs su sbyong bar shes par bya// tshul khrims byas pa gzo dang bzod// rab tu dga' dang snying rtse che// bkur sti bla ma la gus nyan// brgyad pa sbyin la sogs pa brtson//
347b2(mdo 'grel): thos pa mi ngoms nyid dang ni// zang zing med par chos sbyin dang / sangs rgyas zhing kun sbyong ba dang // 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo dang // ngo tsha khrel yod ces bya ba// rlom med bdag nyid de rnam lho// nags gnas
347b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod chung cho ga shes dang // sbyangs pa yang dag sdo ma brten dang // bslab pa yongasu mi gtong dang // 'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang // mya ngan 'das dang bdog kun gtong // mi zhum pa dang lta ba meng // 'dris dang khyim dang 'khren pa dang //
347b4(mdo 'grel): 'du 'dzir gyur pa'i gnas dang ni// bdag bstod gzhan la brnyas pa dang // mi dge las kyi lam bcu dang // rlom pas khengs dang phyi ni ci log/ blo ngan dang ni nyon mongs bzod // bcu po 'di ni rnam spangs nas// sa lnga pa ni yang dag 'thob/
347b5(mdo 'grel): nga tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// byas maM gtan shes rab rab rdzogs pas// slob ma dang mi bse ru la// dga' dang skrag pa'i sems spangs dang // bsrungs na mi zhum 'dog pa kun/ btang yang mi dga' med pa dang // dbul yang sreng
347b6(mdo 'grel): ba mi spong bas// sa ni drug pa yang dag 'thob// bdag dang sems can 'dzin pa dang // srog dang gang zag chad rtag dang // mtshan ma rgyu dang phung po dang // khams dang skye mched dag dang ni// mA gsuM pa la gnas dang cha hA/ sems ni kun tu zhum pa
348a1(mdo 'grel): dkon mchog gsum dang tshul khrims la/ der lbu ba yi mngon zhen dang / stong pa nyid la rtsod pa dang / de dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa ni// nyi shu gang la rnam chad pa/ de yis sa ni bdun pa thob/
348a2(mdo 'grel): rnam thar sgo gsum shes pa dang / 'khor gsum rnam par dge nyid dang // snying rje dang ni rlom med dang // chos mnyam nyid dang tshul gcig shes// mi skye ba dang bzod shes dang // chos rnams rnam pa gcig
348a3(mdo 'grel): du ston// rtog pa kun tu 'joms pa dang // 'du shes lta dang nyon mongs spong / zhi gnas nges par sems pa dang // lhag mthong la ni mkhas pa dang // sems dul ba dang thams cadag/ thogs pa med pa'i
348a4(mdo 'grel): ye shes dang // chags pa'i sa min gar 'dod pa'i// zhing gzhan du ni mnyam 'gro dang // kun du bdag gi ngo bo ni// stong pa nyid dang nyi shu'o// sems can kun yid shes pa dang // mngon par shes pas rtse ba dang /
348a5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas zhing bzang bsgrub pa dang // yongasu brtag phyir sangs rgyas bstan// dbang po shos dang rgyal ba yi// zhing skyong sgyu ma ltar gnas dang // bsam bzhin srid pa len pa dang // las ni rnam pa 'di brgyad
348a6(mdo 'grel): bshad// smon lam dag ni mtha' yas dang // lha lo sogs pa'i skad shes dang // stobs pa chu bo lta bu dang // mngal du 'jug pa mchog dang ni// rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang // 'khor dang skye ba
348b1(mdo 'grel): g+ha dang ni// nges 'byung byang chub shing rnams dang // yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yin// sa dgu 'das nas ye shes ni/ gang gis sangs rgyas sar gnas bya// da ni byang chub sems dpa' ban+d+ha TA yin par
348b2(mdo 'grel): shes par bya// 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las su bcu yongasu sbyong ba'i lam brjod pa ste nyi shu rtsa brkyang pa'o// // tshogs ni thams cad ma lus pas/ lam ni yong su drag
348b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rgyun// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku bzhi ni/ blo chen rnams kyis rdzogs par 'gyur// khams gsum spyod sa las grol ba/ dag cing zhi la mkha' mnyam pa/ rtogs par dka' ba yin
348b4(mdo 'grel): badren zhing dpe med mthug po ste/ mchog gi bde bas khyab pa'o// mchog tu mi 'gyur bde dam pa// rnam med cha las 'das// yang dag mtha' ste 'od gsalashes pa'i chos
348b5(mdo 'grel): gnyis 'das// phra rab rdul ni rnam par spangs// skyed cing 'jigs med snying rtse yi// mahAr phyin chos rnams rlung gzhi ga/ lhan skyes ngo bo nyid ces pa'i// skye dri yang ma rgyas spyod yul mngon par rtog
348b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i rgyun du ni// 'phags pa mi pham pas gsungs te// thub pa'i ngo bo nyid nga sku ni// zag pa med pa'i tshe dag/ thob gyur rnam kun rnam dag pa// de dag rang bzhin mtshan nyid can/ ngo bo nyid
349a1(mdo 'grel): kyi sgra'o// byang chub phyogs sogs chos rnams ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams spyod yul// sgrib pa kun las nges grol ba// stong pa nyid dang ro gcig mchog/ chos rnams de dag kun gyi ni
349a2(mdo 'grel): rten du yang dag rab tu brjod/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ khyab bdag stong nyid ro gcig ste// rnam dag stong zhing gcig pa'i bdag/ sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin dam pa ste// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pas
349a3(mdo 'grel): dngos dang dngos min gcig mtshan nyid/ bden pa nyid kyi bdog nyid du// dpal ldan chos sku ston pa'o// gtso bo ye shes tshogs nyid ni// yongs su smin pa mkha' dang mtshungs/ te/ gtso bo sems gang
349a4(mdo 'grel): gsal dag pa// thub pa zung 'jug bdag nyid do// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de sras kyis// chos kyi skye de gsungs pa ste// mngon rtogs rgyan du gsungs po ni// byang chub phyogs mthun tshud pa med dang // rnam
349a5(mdo 'grel): thar dang mthar gyis ni// snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang // zad par bcu yi bdag nyid dang // zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni// rab du dbye bas rnam brgyad dang // nyon mongs med dang smon
349a6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen dang // mngon shes so so yang dag rig/ rnam pa thams cad dag bzhi dang // dbang bcu dang ni stobs bcu dang // mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi dag dong // bsrung ba med pa rnam gsum dang // dran pa
349b1(mdo 'grel): nye bar gzhag rnam gsum dang // bsgyel ba mi mnga'i chos nyid dang / phyag rmugs yang dgra bcom pa dang // skye la thugs rje chen po dang // thub pa kho na'i ma 'dres chos/ bco brgyad bshad pa gang yin dang // rnam
349b2(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang // chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin// chos kyi sku'o// theg chen kun gyi rnam po ni// sdud pa'i chos ni yang dug gsungs// sa bcu dbang phyug rnams dang ni// de ni bde ba longs
349b3(mdo 'grel): spyod nyid/ thogs meng zag med khyab pa ste// gsal zhing 'byung ba'i rdul phran spangs// dbang po'i gzhu dang min mkha' yi// skar tshogs dri ma med pa bzhin// me long rnams su phan tshun du// de ni #
349b4(mdo 'grel): gzugs brnyan bzhin/ sum cu gnyis mtshan brgyad cu yi// dpe byang rgyan du byas te 'bar// bsod nams tshogs ni gtso bo ru// rnam par smin pa gsung bdag nyid// ma lus na mkha' yongs paSh+Ti
349b5(mdo 'grel): mtha' yas 'od gsal mtha' yas pa// de ltar mngon rtogs rgyan las gsungs// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad brgya bcu'i bdag nyid 'di// theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir// thub pa
349b6(mdo 'grel): longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o// ji lta ji lta'i gzugs kyis ni// sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste// sems can bsam pa'i rjes brtags nos// shAkya thub
350a1(mdo 'grel): pa la sogs pa'i// thub pas 'khor ba ma stongs par// kun du skye dang byang chub sogs// bstan nas 'gro don byed pa ste/ lus gtsor sprul pa'i mtshan nyid de// 'phags pa rgyal ba
350a2(mdo 'grel): byams pas gsungs// gang gis srid pa ji srid par// 'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag/ mnyam du mdzad bya'i sku de ni// thub pa'i sbrul sku rgyun mi 'ching // sbrul sku blo// gzhan yang rgyal byas lung bstan pa//
350a3(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa// khams gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam gyur dngos kun ngo bo nyid// dag cing zhi la rnam bden ma cho ga bzhi'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa nyid yul
350a4(mdo 'grel): rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la bdag gzhan rab phan khyabo rlung mtshan ma med// rgyal ba'i bden pa mnyam med mnyam sku mi rtog sku gcig la phyag 'tshal// lhan cig skyes pa'i sku'o// gang zhig
350a5(mdo 'grel): smin du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan phu phan phun tshogs chen po'i gzhir gyur pa// dngos dang dngos med ma yin na mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam rtog par dka' ba'i rang bzhin cano// 'gyur med gos pa med
350a6(mdo 'grel): cing zhi la mi mnyam mnyam pa khyab pa po ste spros med pa// so sor rang rig dpe med rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku nge la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku'o// gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das bsam
350b1(mdo 'grel): gyis mi khyab legs byas dam pa'i 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du/ 'byor pas 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs gsal mdzad blo ldan chen po rnams ni dga' ba'i sku// sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jig rten kun+da
350b2(mdo 'grel): las rabo byung rgyun mI 'chad par rgyu chen dam chos sgrogs// chos kyi rgyal srid che la rab tu bzhugs longs spyod rdzogs sku de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o// gang zhig
350b3(mdo 'grel): sems can sbyin pa'i ched du la lar me bzhin du ni gsal bur snang gyur cing // yang ni la lar rdzogs par byang chub chos 'khor bskor nas slaR+Sha yang mya ngan las 'das gang mthong // rnam pa du mar
350b4(mdo 'grel): bzhugs nas srid gsum 'jigs pa sel ba'i thabs su sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni// phyogs bcur rjes skyong don chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku lho 'dir ni phyag 'tshal lo// sprul pa'i sku'i
350b5(mdo 'grel): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la gnas// mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyi yang // spros pa rgyo che ba yi phyir/ so so ru nI mngon brjod// bla ma'i rjes 'gro la sogs pas// phyag zhabs 'khor los
350b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan po'o// mi phyed sdom pa blangs pa yis// zhabs ni rab tu legs par gnas// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni// yun rangs du ni bsten pa yis// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ni// ngang pa
351a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du d+hu ngas 'brel// gya nom pa yi bza' bcu' sogs// rab tu byin pas phyag zhabs ni// gzhon cing 'jam ste byis pa ni// skye ma thag pa ji bzhin no// ldag pa la sogs
351a2(mdo 'grel): byin pa yis// phyag zhabs gnyis kyi rgyab dang ni// lhag khung phrag pa gnyis te bdun// mtho ba yi ni sku tson nyid// bsod pa'i skye bo thar byas pos// lag pa'i sor mo ring pa nyid// skye 'gro'i mtsho
351a3(mdo 'grel): l-i phan btags pas// rtag tu rtings pa yangs pa nyid// srog gcod pa ni spangs pa yis// sku che shin tu drang bya nyid// dge tshwa so blangs po'i gtso bo yis// zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon nyid// dge ba blang
351a4(mdo 'grel): te spel ba yis// spu ni gyen du phyogs pa nyid// rig dang bzo sogs gus byas te// byin pa e Ne'i byin pa nyid// slong la bdog pa'i nor byin pas// phyag ni ring zhing mdzes pa nyid// gsang ba'i tshig ni bskyang
351a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang // 'gro ba tshangs spyod lo bskyod pas// 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs ni// nub pa ny-id du grags pa'o// gding ba gya nom pa byin pas// mdog ni gasbyor 'dra ba nyid dang // kha bzangs dam pa byin pa yis
351a6(mdo 'grel): pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog nyid// 'du 'dzi la sogs spangs pa yis// spu ni re re nas g.yas 'khyil// dge ba'i bshis gnyen thams cad ni// gnas ji lta bzhin bskod pa yis// zhal mdzod
351b1(mdo 'grel): sgyus mtshan drag tshig ni// med pas seng ge'i ro stod 'dra// spyan dang rim pas legs smras pas// dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa nyid// smin la sogs pa rab 'byin pas// thal gong yang drug rgyus pa dang
351b2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin nang pa'i g.yog byas pas// ro nI bro bI'i mchog nyid do// nag tshul kun dka ra ba sogs// myi rnams ng+tha rig byed bcug pas// sku yI dkyil 'khor mnyam nyid de// n+ya gro d+ha yi dkyil 'khor
351b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin// gtsug lagaso khang sogs byin pa yis// dbu ni gtsug tor ldan pa nyid// 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig smyos pas// ljags ni ring zhing srab pa nyid// dam chos legs par go/
351b4(mdo 'grel): byas pas// de bzhin tshangs pa'i gsung nyid do// sems can kun la tshig bkyil pa// spangs pas seng ge'i 'gram pa nyid// sems can kun la legs bkur ba'i// sbyin pa sogs kyis tshams
351b5(mdo 'grel): dokar nyid// 'tsho bdag pa don gnyer bas// tshems ni mnyam pa nyid du brjod// bden tshig kun du spyad pa yis// tshems ni thags ni bzang ba nyid// phra ma'i tshig/ spongs pa yis// tshems
351b6(mdo 'grel): ni bzhi bcu tshang ba nyid// sems can kun la mnyam nyid du// bltas pas spyan ni mthon mthong nyid// khong khro sogs dang bral ltas pas// rdzi ma pa yi lta bu nyid// gsungs pa 'di
352a1(mdo 'grel): dag thub chen gyi// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyi spro// 'du byed kun+d+ha la ma chags pas// thub pa'i sen mo zungs mdog nyid// sems can kun la phan+da bsams pas//
352a2(mdo 'grel): sen mo'i mdog ni snum pa nyid// rigs kyi mchog las 'khrungs pa'i phyir/ sngon mo mtho ba nyid yin no// tshul ni kha na mya tho ba// med pas sbyor mo zlum pa nyid// legs par dge bu
352a3(mdo 'grel): bstsags pa yis// so mo rnams ni rgyas pa ni// mthar gyis zhugs pa nyid kyis ni// sor mo byin gyis phra ba nyid// lus sogs las dang 'tsho ba ni// rab bsrungs rtsa mi mngon pa nyid//
352a4(mdo 'grel): nyon mongasra mdud pa rnam grol bas// rtsa yi mdud pa med pa nyid// sems la chos ni sgras po yis// long bu myi mngon pa nyid do// skye bo kun bgrod dku' bsgral bas// zhabs mi mnya
352a5(mdo 'grel): pa med pa nyid// mi zil gnon mkhas bsod nams kyis// seng ge'i stabasu gshegs pa nyid// klu zil gnon mkhas bsod nams kyis// glang po'i sbubasu gshegs pa nyid// nam
352a6(mdo 'grel): mkha' la gshegs mkhas bsod nams kyis// dang pa'i stabasu gshegs pa nyid// skyes bu khyu mchog bsod nams kyis// khyu mchog stobasu gshegs pa nyid// bskor phyogs
352b1(mdo 'grel): lam mthun gshegs pa yis// g.yas ldog cing gshegs pa nyid// mdzes pa'i dge ma khwa nyid kyis ni// yang dag mdzes par gshegs pa nyid// rtag tu gya gyu'i sems med pas// mi g.yo bar ni
352b2(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa yin// rnam dag yon tan thob pa'i phyir// sku nI 'khril bag chags pa nyid// sdig pa'i chos dang ma 'phags pas// sku ni byi dor byas 'dra nyid// 'dul bya kun gyi sems brtags nas// dam
352b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos ni ston pa dang / lus sogs gtsang sbra'i tshul gyis ni// sku ni rim par 'tsham pa dang // sku sogs kun spyod gtsang ba'i phyir// sku ni shin tu gtsang ba nyid// thugs ni brtse chen gyis brlan phyir/
352b4(mdo 'grel): sku ni shin tu 'jam pa nyid// thugs ni shin tu yongs drug phyir// sku ni rnam par dag pa nyid// chos 'dul ba ni rdzogs pa yiso// thub pa'i mtshan ni rdzogs pa nyid// yangs mdzes yon tan brjod pa
352b5(mdo 'grel): yis// s+yA yI kho lag yangs pa nyid// kun+da la thugs ni snyoms pa'i phyir// gom pa shin du snyoms pa nyid// rnam dag chos ni yang dgra ston// spyanA ni shin du yongs dag nyid// gro sla'i chos ni ston pa'i phyir//
352b6(mdo 'grel): shin tu gzhon sha can nyid dang // thugs ni rtag tu ma zhum phyir// sku ni zhum pa med pa nyid// dge ba yang dge 'phags pa yis// shin du rgyas shing mtho bo'i sku// yang srid pa ni zad pa'i phyir// sku ni shin du
353a1(mdo 'grel): grims pa nyid// rten cing 'brel 'byung gsal ston pas// yan lag rnam par phyed pa nyid// tshig don shin du rnam drug pu// ston pas gzigs pa dag pa nyid// brtul zhugs phun tshogs
353a2(mdo 'grel): slob ma ni// bsdus pas sku ni zlum pa nyid// bdud stobs 'joms pas sku maM zhom// de bzhin dam pa'i sku nyid do// chos zad pa ni bzlog pa'i phyir// phyal ni phya d+he pa nyid do// shin tu zab pa'i chos ston pas//
353a3(mdo 'grel): lte ba zab pa nyid yin no// slob ma mthun par 'dzin pa yis// lte ba g.yas phyogs 'khyil pa nyid// thams cang ngu ni rab mdzes pa'i// 'khor 'byung po yi chos nyid kyis// de'i phyir kun du rtags par ni// kun
353a4(mdo 'grel): nas mdzes pa nyid yin no// thugs ni kun du yang dag phyir// kun du spyod pa gtsang po nyid// dus myin chos dang bral ba'i phyir// sku la sme ba nag sbag med// lus sogs zo mdog bde ba yis// rgyu yi chos ni bstan pa'i
353a5(mdo 'grel): phyir/ phyag gnyis shing bal lta bur ni// shin du logs par 'dzem pa nyid// dge sbyong chen+da po brnyes pa yis// phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod nyid// chos zab mo la gnas pa'i phyir// phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid//
353a6(mdo 'grel): phyi rjesu ni yang dag par// yongs dag chos ni ston mdzad dang // sems can kun la brtse ba yis// phyag gi ri mo ringo bo nyid// bslab pa rab mang kun ston pas// zhal ni ha cang mi ring nyid// khams gsum po
353b1(mdo 'grel): ni thams cad kyi// shin tu rab tu gsal ba ni// gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pa'i phyir// mchu ni bim pa ltar dmar nyid// 'jam por smras pas ljags mnyan nyid// yon tan mchog myadangs ljags srab nyid//
353b2(mdo 'grel): chags pa'i byis pas gting dpag dka'i// chos kyi 'dul bas ljags dmar nyid// bskyongs pa thams tsAng mi mnga' bas// 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa nyid// shin du sman la sogs gsungs pas/
353b3(mdo 'grel): gsung snyan mo nyan+ma la 'jam pa nyid// srid pa'i kun sbyor bsdams pa'i phyir// mche pa zlum pa nyid yin no// gdul dka'i sems can 'dul ba'i phyir// mche ba rno ba nyid yino// shin du dka
353b4(mdo 'grel): bri'i chos kyis ni// btul phyir mche ba dkar ba nyid// mnyam pa'i sa la rab gnas phyir/ mche ba rab tu mnyam pa nyid// rim pas chos ni nges rtogs shIng / gsal bas
353b5(mdo 'grel): mche ba byin gyis phra// shes rab mchog la gnas pa'i phyir// shangs ni mtho zhing yid du 'ong // skye 'gro gtsang ma phun tshogs pas// shangs ni yang dag gtsang ba nyid// chos ni shin
353b6(mdo 'grel): du rgya che'i phyir// spyan ni spangs pa nyid yin no// don gyi tshogs ni bsdus pa yis// mchog tu rdzi mo la stsags pa nyid// gzhon nu ma kun mngon mgu bas// spyan ni pad 'dab rgyas 'dra
354a1(mdo 'grel): nyid// rtag tu phyi rjes gzigs pa'i phyir// de bzhin smin tshugs rnying ba nyid// chos 'dul 'jam po la mkhas pas// smin ma shin du 'jam pa nyid// thugs rgyud dge bas
354a2(mdo 'grel): brlan pa'i phyir// sbyin ma shin tu snum po nyid// thams cad du ni skyon gzigs phyir// smin+d+ra ma'i spu ni mnyam pa nyid// mchog tu gnod pa bzlog mdzad pas// phyag ni ring zhing rgyas po nyid// chags
354a3(mdo 'grel): sngogs g.yul las nges rgyal bas// skan gnyis mnyam pa nyid yin+da no// sems can kun gyi rgyud la nI// rab tu gnod pa spangs pa yi swA// sgra gsan snyan gyi dbang po ni// nyams pa rnam par spangs pa
354a4(mdo 'grel): nyid// lta bas byas pa thams cad kyis// gzhan du mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis// dpral pa legs 'byes rtsod pa kun// zhi byas dbyes ni che ba nyid// smon lam yongasu rdzogs pa yis// dbu ni yongasu rgyas
354a5(mdo 'grel): ba nyid// 'dod lo zhen pa bzlog pa yis// dbu skra byung ba lhur gnag nyid// mtho du bsgom pa'i spang bya nI// bcom pas dbu skra stug pa nyid// bstan pa blo ni 'jam po yis// yongasu shes pas da
354a6(mdo 'grel): sgra 'jam// dri mas thun ni mi 'khrugs pas// sgo ni ma 'dzings pa nyid do// rtag par tshig rtsub ma brjod pas// sna ni mi go shor ba nyid do// byang chub yan lag me tog ni// 'akram phyir dbu skra drizhi
354b1(mdo 'grel): nyi// rtag par kun tu mdzes par ni// 'gyur byaSh+Ti bsod nams nyid kyis ni// dpal byeSh+pa dang ni b+hAk+ka shes mtshan// dpal gyis mdzes pa'i phyug 'bras nyid// 'di dag ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
354b2(mdo 'grel): dpe byang bzang po brgyad cu ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la gnas pa'o// 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sku bzhi brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// /
354b3(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i lam 'jug yang dag par// sbyar las bsod nams tshad myed gang // de yis 'gro kun rgyal ba yi// lam la legs par 'jug par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams 'di
354b4(mdo 'grel): yis ni// na mkha' kun khyab skye bo rnams// ngan 'gro kun las nges grol zhing // mi khom thams cad rnam par spongs// skye bar lha dang mi yi ni// skye ba lho dang yongasu thob par shog/ srid pa'i rdzug
354b5(mdo 'grel): bsngal gyis skrag pas// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing // dam chos nyan sems don bsgom dang // sems ni dben par gnas par shog/ theg pa chen po la gnas tAM// tshangs pa'i
354b6(mdo 'grel): spyo dang ldan par shog/ lam kun rnam par bsgoms pa yis// sa la sogs pa kun thob nas// zhing kun yang dag sbyangs nasu// myur du rgyal ba thob par shog/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas skabasu//
355a1(mdo 'grel): bsam pa'i don kun thams cad ni// na mkha'i mdzod bzhin mkha' nyid nas// sems can kun la 'byung bar shog/ sa bcu na mkha'i mthar gnas pa'i// 'jig rten khams ni
355a2(mdo 'grel): dag rnams// don grub 'jig rten khams bzhin du// de dag thams cad rnam dge shog/ bdag kyang byang chub snying po'i bar// zang zing mi 'jigs dom chos dang // byams pas sems can thams cad kyi// bsam
355a3(mdo 'grel): kun yongasu rdzogs byed cing // rtag pa nyid du tshangs spyod dang // sdom pa kun gyis bsdams par shog/ sems can don kun byed pa dang // chos kun don ni ston par shog/ 'jig rten khams kyi sems
355a4(mdo 'grel): tsAn kun// bdag lo gnod pa byed kyang ni// bdag ni de dag thams cad la// phani 'dogs byed pa nyid du shog/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsran nas bdagAM/ rtag par sems can don la brtson// sems
355a5(mdo 'grel): ni dam chos bsam gtan la// ro gcig bsnun pa nyid du shrog/ ji ltar brtson 'groldan brtson 'grus bzhin// bdag kyang go che sbyor ba dang // de bzhin mi ldog pa zhes pa'i// brtson 'grus dang ni ldan
355a6(mdo 'grel): par shog/ ting 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yi// tshogs kyi byang chub bsgrubs pa yis// bsamanyan kun pa gcig tu gnas// bdag sems rdo rje lte bur shog/ shes rab na mkha'i mtha'
355b1(mdo 'grel): khyab pa// rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid dang // rab mthug kun dgra'i tshogs dang ni// snying rje'i ro yis nges gang zhing // thabs dang smon lam de bzhin du// stobs ni rab tu 'byor pa dang / ye shes bdag sto//
355b2(mdo 'grel): 'di dag ni// bdag la rnam par dag par shog/ mngon shes kun gyi mthar phyin te// khyad par lam ni thob par shog/ sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyangs te// bdag ni sangs rgyas nyid
355b3(mdo 'grel): gyur cig/ 'di nyid kyi ni rim pa yis// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// 'khor ba pa yi sems can kun// myur du rgyul pA nyid du shog/ bsod nam sa yongs su bsngo
355b4(mdo 'grel): ba 'di// bdag nyid kyi ni blo yis byas// kun nas kun du ma lus pa// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen pas na// kun du bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i// smon lam rgya mtsho ji lta ba/ de bzhin du
355b5(mdo 'grel): ni bdag la yang // dge ba rgya mtsho de myur du// 'bras bu dang ni bcas par shog/ phyogs bcu na mkha' kun khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyal rnams glong // de dgra ji ltar smon
355b6(mdo 'grel): lam ni// mngon du byas pa'i rim pa rnams// de tsam nyid du bdag gis kyang // bsam po brtan pa de bzhin gyi// bsod nams mthu yos 'di dag ni// de bzhin du ni
356a1(mdo 'grel): par shog/ ji ltar dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs kyi// smon lam de ltar bdag gi yang // dus ni yul mi ring ba yis// smon lam 'di ni yongs rdzogs shog/ sangs rgyas kun rnams
356a2(mdo 'grel): rang rang gi/ zhing bzhugs mya ngan mi 'da' zhing // mkha' mnyam chos kyi char gyis ni// rtag tu sems can phan byed shog/ sems can rnams kyang sangs rgyas chos// dge 'dun bcas pa rnam pa tham
356a3(mdo 'grel): cang la// lha rdzas mchod sbyin mtha' yas pas// yang dag par ni mchod byed shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyis// 'jig rten khams kun grang bar shog/ mchog gi chos rnams sems
356a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing // sred pa sbyong bar byed par shog/ lung don gang dang 'galta ba dang // don med pa'am yang na ni// gong 'og 'chol dang sgra ngan ldan// gzhung gi skyon ni cung zad gang // brtse ba can gyis
356a5(mdo 'grel): drug byed pa'am// 'on to sgro skur spangs te byas// chos kyi blo tsam gyis byas phyir// mkhas pas bdag la bzod par rigs// blo ni zhen par gyur pa dang // so so skye bo yin pa'i phyir// 'dir
356a6(mdo 'grel): ni bdog gis skyon bsdus gang // spang zhing chos dang mthun bzung ste// blo can brtsibs bzod par mdzod// 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las smon lam gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o//
356b1(mdo 'grel): ji skad bshad pa'i spang bya dor// gzung bya thams cad blang bar bya// rtogs pa thams cad bsdu bya zhing // chos kyi bdag med goms par byas// rang gzhan phyir ni slob dpon ni// sangs rgyas
356b2(mdo 'grel): ye shes dpal gyis byos// rgyal ba'i lom la 'jug pa yi// chos bsdus pa ni rdzogs pa'o// rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa zhes bya ba kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta tshon po rigs pa'i gnas lnga la
356b3(mdo 'grel): sbyangs shing byang chubo kyi sems kyis brgyan pa bud+d+ha shri dz+nyA na zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // e ma/ rtsom pa'i tshad ldan pa Na chen gyis mdzad rgyal byi'i lam
356b4(mdo 'grel): 'jug 'di// nyung la gsal rdzogs lung ngo rIgaso dang 'brel don chen ldan mthong ste// legs sbyar skad kyis dben pa'i mi rnams le ni phan 'dod nas// rtsod dus
356b5(mdo 'grel): skyes kyang rig gnas lnga sbyangs sdom gsum la gnas pa'i// bod yul dbus kyi dge slong dgra bcom leg sa par mnyan te bsgyur// phrag dog 'gran khengs dreg sems
356b6(mdo 'grel): spongs te blangs na don chen 'gyur// gang dag srid zhe na blo zhan 'tsho med long med bsgom 'dod sogs// thos bral rnamasakyang 'di tsam cig nyan nus na thos mang 'gyur//
357a1(mdo 'grel): gzhung 'di'i tshad na tshugs bcad snod dang gcig brgyus lhag pa ste// s+yA dAn+ta dpyad nAs bsgyur kyang rmongs na mkhas rnams bzod pan+d+ha
357a2(mdo 'grel): bzhes/ brnams zhus bsgyur ba'i mkhan po gsum gyis 'byud 'byes 'di dUr nas// dge dus bdag so ga sku 'gro kunargyal ba'i lam zhugs kun mkhyen shog
357a3(mdo 'grel): bsgyur ba'i dgos 'brel dang gzhan la gdams pa dang bzod par gsol ba dang bsngo ba la sh+lo ka gsum lo ts+tsha bas bgyis so//
357a4(mdo 'grel): swa pa ra hai ta b+ha tu bdag kyang gzhan la phan par shog/
358a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa slob dpon dpal sgra gcan 'dzin bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs so//
358b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bau d+hi satwa gau tsA r-i pa r-i shud+d+hi sU tAn+na sang gru ha/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems/
358b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' dag spyod yul ma yin pa/ spyod yul spyod yul min spangs pas/ spyod yul tham sa cad drag gyur pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 'dud// zhing ni yongasu
358b3(mdo 'grel): sbyong 'dod pas// rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud dag la// byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar yid// sa so'o spyod yul 'gyur bar bya// thig mar gnyid gsad de yi tshwa// 'di ltar yid la bya ba ni/ bsod nams ye shes mngon 'phel
358b4(mdo 'grel): don// 'bad pa med par mkhas gyur cig/ bag maud gnyid las rnam grol zhing // skye dgu'i mi shes mtshan mo zad// thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi shur bzhin/ bla med de mthong ldan par shog/ gnyid yongs su gsad
358b5(mdo 'grel): pa yi'o// ljang tshe nyon mongs nyer len gyi/ 'khor ba'i gnas mal spangs nas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas brnyes de ltar// stobs dang brtson sogs bla med shog/ gnas mal las yongs su ldang ba'i'o//
358b6(mdo 'grel): tsha dang ni khril yod gos// byams dang snying rje'i ska rags ni/ sems can thams cad bla med par// rgyal ba ji bzhin gyen gyur cig/ smad g.yogs gyon pa'i'o// byams chen dang ni brtse ba'i gos/ bde gshegs
359a1(mdo 'grel): ji bzhin gyon pa dang / mtha' da sha sems can yan lag ni/ lcags sbas mnyam pa nyid gyur cig/ dag lags gron pa'i'o// bla med theg pa chen por ni// rkang pa 'jug
359a2(mdo 'grel): par byed gyur cig/ lha yi bzhon dang tshangs pa yi// bzhon pa la sogs nges 'byung gAM/ rim pas mthar gyis bgrod par shog/ mchil lham gyen pa'i 'o// lus can thams cad thams cad du/ thams
359a3(mdo 'grel): cad bo de 'gro myang 'das dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer gnas// sgo chen po ni 'byed par shog/ sgo dbye ba'i 'o// khams gsum rmongs pa chen po yi// srid pa'i khyi ma las phyir byung ste/ mas
359a4(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa gsal 'dod pa// 'jig rten mtho' dag nges 'gro shog/ khang pa las phyir 'byung ba'i'o// mi khom ngon 'gro'i g.yang sa las// mtha' dag skye bo rnams kyi sgo// me dge gang byas byang mas dang
359a5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyis kyang bA cang gyur cig/ sgo 'bregs pa'i'o// bla med de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ goms pas thams cad du bgrod shog/ 'gro ba'i 'o// nyon mongs ngan pa yi/ kha
359a6(mdo 'grel): gyur cig/ dri ma 'dor ba'i'o// mi gtsang dra mi zhim sogs 'dor// chu la khrims 'chal pa'i dri bsal te/ rtse dang bya ba dag pa yi// phag zhabs sems can ldan gyur
359b1(mdo 'grel): sgor/ rnam 'phel bde bar gshegs pa bzhin// kun mkhyen tshul khrims dri zhim dang / ye shes snang ba 'cha par shog/ kha 'khru ba dang gapaza pa'i 'o// rtag tu sems can mnyam pa gA
359b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad dang / bral zhing thams cad mtshungs par yang / rdo rje snying po'i lus su shog/ snyun nye bar spyod pa'i'o// kun nas rab tu dang pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs rdul spangs te/ sems can rdzogs pa'i sa
359b3(mdo 'grel): rgyas bzhin/ blta pas myi ngoms skur gyur cig/ chag chag dang phyag dar bskyal nul gyi'o// spyi gtsug 'jig rten mi mthong dang / lha dang mi la sogs rnams kyi// phyag 'os rtag tu sems can kun/ rdzogs sangs
359b4(mdo 'grel): mchod rten bzhin mchod shog/ mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i 'o// skyes bu chen po seng ge yi// chos 'dzin rdo rje gdan 'dug ste/ 'os su gyur pa'i sems can gyi// bdud stobs stobs las rgyal thob shog/ stan dang
359b5(mdo 'grel): gding ba'i 'o// kun mkhyen dam chos thams cad kyi// mdzod ni 'byod dang 'don pa dang / skye bo rnams kyi bka' lung ni// tshangs dbyangs lta bu thob par shog/ glegs bam 'byed pa dang 'don pa la sogs pa'i 'o// rdul
359b6(mdo 'grel): dang nad kyi skyon spangs te/ gser gyi mdog can mnyen nyid dang / sna tshogs yan lag mtshan nyid bzang // sems can rgyal ba ji bzhin shog/ bla med rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyan/ dag pa lnga dang rtag zhing // nyon
360a1(mdo 'grel): mongs gdung ba dri ma'i tshogs// luswA can rnams ni dag par shog/ dril phyis dang spyan 'byed dang khrus la sogs pa'i 'o// lam gyi yan lag brgyad ldan chus// yun ring zug rngur bying phyung ste/
360a2(mdo 'grel): chos shes mngon par dag byed dpal/ lus can rnams kyis rnyed par shog/ khrus bya ba sbyin po'i 'o// ma lus bkres dang skom pa las/ bde gshegs bzhin du rnam grol dang / ye shes bdud rtsis logs
360a3(mdo 'grel): tshim zhing / sems can rnams ni nad med gyur// bza' dang btung ba la longs spyod pa'i 'o// kun mkhyen ye shes spyod pa yis/ kha mgrin dpal ni brgyan pa dang // mi gnas mya ngan 'das par ni/ shes brtse'i
360a4(mdo 'grel): gom pas rim bgrod shig/ lung bstan rnam pa bzhi dag dang / so sor yang dag rig rnam bzhi// pha rol phyin pa chen po'i lam/ bzhon pa chen por 'dzeg par shog/ brtse dang shes rab yang dag 'byung // ma lus
360a5(mdo 'grel): lus dang ngag gi las/ gzhan don phyir mi ldog par ni/ sems can thams cad mnyam gyur cig/ taum po la zla ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'bel ba'i gtam dang / lam dang / bzhon pa la 'jigs pa dang /
360a6(mdo 'grel): bya ba rnams kyi'o// thams cad du ni sgrib bral gyi// dran dang shes rab yon tan ldan// sems can thams cad don phyin phyir yang // sems can kun dge byed gyur cig/ de dang de'i spyod yul gyi sgo'i rnam pa'o//
360b1(mdo 'grel): bla med de bzhin gshegs pa yau n+do tshul khrims dri// byung chub nA lagrA mU tog mdzes khebs de yan lag/ bzung pon+da mArgyun rnams kyis na mngon par+yA ban+d+han pa dang // sems can rnams ni 'gyu ban+d+ha
360b2(mdo 'grel): don 'dod gyur par shog/ dri 'am bdug pa dang / me tog dang rgyan byin pa'i'o// grang dang tsha ba'i gdung ba sbrel bar byed pa'i dri zhim dang / gdugs dang 'dra ba'i phyogs kyi gnas yangs bdag po dang / chos kyi
360b3(mdo 'grel): rgyal mtshani bsgreng bsna phyogs su brgyan pa yis// sems can rnams ni 'gro le rab tu gsal gyur cig/ me tog dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bA dan bsgreng pa'i 'o// shes rab tu gsal bas mun pa
360b4(mdo 'grel): rnam bcol zhing / des ni sdig pa'i snum dang sdong bu bsregs nas ni/ spyan sngar nye bar 'phel ba rnams ni thob pa dang / rgyal ba lta bur sems can rnams ni rab gsal shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na
360b5(mdo 'grel): med pa mi 'gyur ba'i// s+thA na dang ldan zhi de legs pa bla na med mi mi 'gyur ba'i// snyan+da dang ldan zhing legs pa'i yid shes ngag dag dang / tshangs dbyangs ltar 'gyur de dge yon tan chen po ni/ seMn
360b6(mdo 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa dag dang mtshungs gyur cig/ sgron ma dang bstod pa 'brel ba'i 'o// 'igro ba khyab par rgyun chags min/ mtha' dag smon lam chen po rnams// rgyun chags med 'das brtse ba yi/ mal
361a1(mdo 'grel): bde bar lhag par nyal gyur cig/ mya smad spyod pa thams cad du// pha rol sems can rjes 'dzin des// rang tshul spyod dang spyod yul ni/ sems can sangs rgyas bzhin gyur cig/ smon
361a2(mdo 'grel): lam dang gnas mal dang ma spyad pa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi'o// spyod yul yongs su dge pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon dpe la sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
361a3(mdo 'grel): dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'grin zla dang bral ba kha che shAkya shrI bzang po dang / lots+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyu ra pa'o// 6/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga slob dpon bu sgrub kyis mdad pa bzhug so//
361a4(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsit+ta uta pa ta bi d+hi/ brod skad du/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lnga phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
361a5(mdo 'grel): mtha' yis mu med pa dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyu sgo dang / dmi pa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag
361a6(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ thog mo dang tha ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba 'khor ba'i tshe/ lus dang ngag dang yid
361b1(mdo 'grel): kyis/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / sems can dag la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa dang bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba ci mchis pa de dag thams cad
361b2(mdo 'grel): gcig tu bsdoms shing bsdus te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar bla na med pa'i so sor bshags par 'chags so// mi 'chab bo// slan chad 'di lta bu mi bgyid do// de skad
361b3(mdo 'grel): na gsum bzlas/ sdig pa bshags pa'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa kyis bsad nams
361b4(mdo 'grel): kyi rjes su yi rat+na ba bla ni med pa thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas drang 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang
361b5(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi ring ngo // de skad ldan gsum bzlas// bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs
361b6(mdo 'grel): su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du dus 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
362a1(mdo 'grel): rgyus rkang gnyis kyi mchog la skyabs su chi ste/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang / la bA/ skyes pa chen po/ skyes
362a2(mdo 'grel): bu khyu mchog sku bsam gyis mi khyab pA/ bla nu med pa'i sgra/ chos kyi sgyu mAng ba la skyabs su mchi'o// chos 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mchog la skyabs su mchi me bla 'a med pa/ ga/ sa pa la
362a3(mdo 'grel): myanga' bu/ zhi ba chos kyi sku so so ring gis rig pa laskyabs su ma che'o// dge 'dun dul ba tshogs kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi ste/ phyogs bzhi'i 'phags pa phyir mi lco pa'i byang chub sem dpa
362a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de skad lan gsum bzlas/ skyabs su 'gro ba'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs smra gosal/ bdag ming 'dri zhes @
362a5(mdo 'grel): dus 'di nas gzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dus ji lta ba dang stobs ci mchis pa bzhin du bdag 'bul zhing mchis na/ mgon pa tra
362a6(mdo 'grel): rje chen po dang ldan po dge bdog bzhis su gsol/ de skad lan gsum bzlas/ bdag dbul ba'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// ji ltar sdom gyi da pa
362b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dgu sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems//
362b2(mdo 'grel): can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i slad du ji ltar bla na med
362b3(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du sems can thams cad bsgrol ba dang
362b4(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngon las bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa
362b5(mdo 'grel): ye shes la dgod pa'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu sems bskyed do// ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag
362b6(mdo 'grel): gis dngos po thams cad dang bral ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi sems gzod ma nas ma skyes pa
363a1(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi don nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi sa yang dus 'di las bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub tu sems
363a2(mdo 'grel): bskyed do// ji ltar snron gyi de bzhin pashegs po dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bdud dpu dang bcas pa bim par mdzad de/ nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa
363a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ dge ming de zhes lnga gyi sa yang bar du dpung dang bcas pa mtha' gyis te/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o// ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
363a4(mdo 'grel): bcom pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangasu rgya de dag gis nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi po yang nyid mngon par
363a5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskur bar bgyi'o// ji ltar sbyin de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis nyid mngon par rdzogs
363a6(mdo 'grel): par sangs rgyas nas tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bgyi'o// byang chub mchog tu
363b1(mdo 'grel): tu sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can thams cad bdag gis 'gron du gnyer// byang chub spyod mchog yid 'od spyad par bgyi/ 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ de skad lan gsum
363b2(mdo 'grel): bzlas/ byang chub tu ba sems bskyed pa'o// bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / gzhan yong bdag gis bsod nams cung zad ci bgyis pa dang / bgyid pa dang bgyid par
363b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/ ma la sogs pa sems can thams cad dang blodag gi don du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// bdag gis bsod nams 'dis pha ma
363b4(mdo 'grel): sogs pa sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni sbrul lo// ma grol ba rnams ni dgrol lo// dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung ngo // yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni/ yongs su mya dran las
363b5(mdo 'grel): bzla'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa rnams ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o// skyabs ma mchis pa dang gnas ma mchis pa dang dpung gnyen ma mchis pa'i 'jig
363b6(mdo 'grel): rten gyi skyabs dang gnas dang / dpung gnyen du gyur cig/ bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid// thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/ rga nang 'chi ba'i rlabs chen 'khrugs pa yi/ srid
364a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par bgyi// de nas bdag sbyin pa stsol pa dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsom dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa
364a2(mdo 'grel): dang / shes rab rnam par spyod pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la slob pa ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
364a3(mdo 'grel): las brtsams te/ 'das po dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sa chen po la gnas pa rnams kyi rjes su mthun
364a4(mdo 'grel): par 'jug go// 'phags pa dag bdag byang chub sems dpa'i lags kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' legs par gzung du gsol/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang rtswa dang nags kyi shing lta bur/ rtag tu srog chags thams
364a5(mdo 'grel): cad kyi// 'dod dgur dpag med spyod par shig/ mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pas kyang / bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi// nad rnams gso bar bgyid gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bde dang ldan gyur
364a6(mdo 'grel): cig/ ngan 'gro thams cad rtag tu stongs par shog/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag su bzhugs pa// de dag kun gyi smon lam 'grub gyur cig/ de skad lan gsum bzlas/ bsod nams bsngo ba'o// byang chub tu sems bskyed/
364b1(mdo 'grel): bskyed pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal sta nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dAng / zhu chen gyi lats+tsha byA ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cung
364b2(mdo 'grel): nus te gtan la phab pa'o// / byang chub gyi mas dpa'i sdom pa'i chog slob dpon byang chub bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs pa// / rgya gar ska da du/ bo d+hi satwa sa ma pa ra bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ byungachub
364b3(mdo 'grel): snyoms dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gang 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po rnams su brjod pa ste/ sdom pa'i tshul
364b4(mdo 'grel): khrims dang / dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can don byed pa'i tshul khrims so// de rnams la slob par 'dod pa'i khyim pa bam rab tu byung ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
364b5(mdo 'grel): smon lam btab pas/ wA na cig tu chos mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa nus pa/ ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi don mdzad pa dang / gau bar nus pa'i zhabs dag la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba
364b6(mdo 'grel): glingab par bya ste/ bdag rigs kyi bu khyod dam/ tshe dang ljon pa 'am/ btsun pa gang nye bas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par len par 'tshal bas/ de stsal po la rung zhing / dka' ba ma
365a1(mdo 'grel): mchis na/ thang cig bdag la rjes su brtse bas sprul cing gson cig ces so// 'di ltar lan gsum gsol ba btab nas/ bla gosna phrag pa cig tu gzar te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rnams
365a2(mdo 'grel): na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la btud nas/ de rnams kyi yon tan rnams mngon sum du byas nas sems
365a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po bskyed nas/ pus mo btsugs pa 'am sa la tsog tsog por 'dug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdun du bzhugs su gsol nas mchod do// mngon sum du byas nas tshig 'di skad ces brjod do//
365a4(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi bu 'am tshe dang ldan pa 'am btsun pa gang nye bas byang chub sems de pA'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang ba bdag la rjes su sprul du gsol zhes so// de nas rtse gcig tu nyaM bar bzhag nas
365a5(mdo 'grel): sems dang brjes su bskyed de/ bdag ni da ring por mi thogs par zad pa med cing dpag tu med pa bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi gter thob par 'gyur ro zhes don 'di nyid bsam zhing cang mi smra bar bya'o// slar
365a6(mdo 'grel): yang byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa des/ de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sems ma yengs par 'dug pa 'am 'greng bas 'di skad brjod do// khyod ming 'di skad ces bya bas byang chub sems
365b1(mdo 'grel): dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrimasna thams cad de/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims dang bslab pa'i gnas rnams dang tshul khrims gang
365b2(mdo 'grel): ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gyur ba dang / gang bslab pa'i gnas rnams dang / tshul khrims gang da ltar phyogs bcu na de ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims dang
365b3(mdo 'grel): bsgrub pa'i gzhi gang yin pa rnams te/ bslab pa'i gnas rnams dang / tshul khrims gang rnams la 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyis bslab pa dang ldan pa dang
365b4(mdo 'grel): ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis slob par 'gyur ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams da ltar slob pa rnams nod dam/ des kyang nod lags so zhes dam bca'o// lan gsum
365b5(mdo 'grel): du'o// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol// slob dpon bA dgra la dgongs su gsol/
365b6(mdo 'grel): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ gang cung zade lus dang ngag dang yid rnaMs kyi sa sangs rgyas dong byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / ma dang pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la brten
366a1(mdo 'grel): nas bskyed pa 'di dang srid pa gzhan rnams su bdag gis stug pa bgyis pa dang bgyid du sprul pa dang / rjes smra yI radra ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing brnams
366a2(mdo 'grel): ta bsdams nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / slob dpon gyi spyan sngar mchog dang gats+tsha bo'i bshags par bgyi'o// shes shing dran pa rab tu mi 'chab bo// 'di ltar lan+de gsum du'o//
366a3(mdo 'grel): bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la nye bar mchis kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can/ thams
366a4(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ sgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad las 'das pa skyes bu chen po mi phyed pa'i sgra/ bla na med pa'i sku/ chos kyi skye/ rlung gnyis rnams kyi mchog le skyabs su mchi'o// bdag ming
366a5(mdo 'grel): 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdigs pa bshags nas/ dus 'di nas nye brla bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshogs rnams
366a6(mdo 'grel): kyi mi chog la skyabs su mchi'o// 'di ltar lan gsum du'o// bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas/ gsum la skyabs su mchis te/ mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams
366b1(mdo 'grel): bsgral ba'i phyir dang / dbyung ba'i phyir dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la sa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa la bzhag pa'i phyir/ ji ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa
366b2(mdo 'grel): dang da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi sa byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas nyid rtogs pa dang ldan pa dang / rtogs par gyur pa dang / rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar
366b3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad sgrib pa dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa rnams dang / ji ltar chos kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa'i cho ge des/ bdag ming
366b4(mdo 'grel): 'di skad ces bgyi ba slob dpon dang nye bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// 'di ltar lan gsum
366b5(mdo 'grel): mo// bdag gis sdig pa bshags pa 'di dang / gsum la skyobs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
366b6(mdo 'grel): bsngo bar bgyi'o// rgya bas med pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / gling med pa'i 'jig rten la skyabs dang / skyob pa dang / gnas dang dpung gnyen dang / gling du gyur cig/ sems
367a1(mdo 'grel): can thams cad kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las ma sgral ba las bsgral bar gyur cig/ sgrib pa las yongs su ma 'das pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mya ngan lA swA b+ha yo su mya sa bzla bar gyur cig/ dbugs ma phyin
367a2(mdo 'grel): ba rnams dbugs 'byin par gyur cig/ 'di ltar lan gsum mo// bdag maung 'di zhes bgyi bas 'di ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ sems can gyi khams mothe'i med pa la ji ltar ma dang pha dang srong mo dang
367a3(mdo 'grel): spun dang / bu dang bu mi dang / gzhan gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams su gyur pa rnams 'di ltar so sor bzung bar bgyi'o// gzung nas kyang nus pa ji lta ba dang / stobs ji lta ba dang / brten pa ji lta bar dge
367a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed par bgyi'o// 'di nas bzung ste/ cung zad sbyin pa btang bar bgyi'o// tshul khyims bsrung bar bgyi'o// bzod pa bskyed par bgyi'o// brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o// bsam
367a5(mdo 'grel): gtan la snyoms par 'jug go// shes rab brtan par bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsu ba thams cad la yang slob po// de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bla na med pa
367a6(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/ sa chen por chung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po can de rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i 'jug pa'i rjes su mchi'o// 'di ltar slob pa'i byang chub
367b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' bdag byang chub sems dbar dus 'di nas bzung ste/ bdag slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol/ 'di ltar ldan gsum mo// de nas slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol/ 'di ltar lan gsum mo/
367b2(mdo 'grel): de nas slob dpon des sku de'i spyan sgrar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs shing / 'tsho zhing 'dzin pa dang / gzhes pa rnams la zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas btud de gsol
367b3(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o// ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpas bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang nye ba las ji srid du lan gsum du yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa
367b4(mdo 'grel): yang dag par blangs pa la/ bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpas/ ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid dpang du gyur por yang dag par shes te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
367b5(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams mtha' med pa rnams su 'phags pa'i mchog lkog du gyur kyang / sems can gyi don la lkob tu ma gyur pa rnams la/ 'di byang chub sems dpe'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang ba la
367b6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen par gsol lo// 'di ltar lan gsum mo// 'di ltar yang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa'i las kyi rjes la/ 'di ni nges par chos nyid yin te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha'
368a1(mdo 'grel): yas pa la gtugs pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs shing 'dzin pa rnams gzhes pa rnams dang / sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi
368a2(mdo 'grel): lhas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang gis de rnams la 'di lta bur 'gyur ba ste/ ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang nye bas ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang nye ba las byang chub sems
