368a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' dang nye ba las byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang ba blangs so zhes so// 'di ltar re zhig gzhan yang blang ba'i cho ga brjod pa/ gal te yon tan dang ldan pa gang zag de dang nye bar ma gyur/
368a4(mdo 'grel): na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra'i mdun du rang nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa blang bar bya'o// 'di ltar bya ste bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ phyogs bcu'i
368a5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams na 'das pa dang ma byon pA dang du ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sa chen por ba zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la btud par bya ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
368a6(mdo 'grel): lhung sa la btsugs pa 'am/ tsog tsog pos tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ bdage ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / sa chen por
368b1(mdo 'grel): rlung pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsal bar bgyi'o// de rnams kyi yang spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshug khrims kyi sgrum pa ba la/
368b2(mdo 'grel): khrims gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga rA bzhin no// ji srid du byang chub sems dpa'i bdag byang chub sems dpa' 'di nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas kyang bdag bzung du gsol zhes pa ni
368b3(mdo 'grel): las so// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga/ skyob dpo na mkhas pa chen po byang chub bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po bla ma swe nA ya shrI me tra dang
368b4(mdo 'grel): zhu chen gyi l-its+tsha bo dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// byung chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang yed pa blang ba'i chog byang chub sems dpa' dag lang rnam par rgyal bdasam po bzhug so//
368b5(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsit+ta ud pa ta sa ma da na bid+hi/ bode skad du/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang yi dam blang ba'i cho ga/ thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun gyi mes pa ni/ 'jas mchog
368b6(mdo 'grel): mgon la rab btud nas/ byang chub tu ni sems bskyed dang / yi dam gsal po bri bar bya/ de la dang po re zhig rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rten dang bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas/ dge
369a1(mdo 'grel): bA'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang ldan pa'i thad du song nas/ dkyil 'khor bya ba sngon du btang ste pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo
369a2(mdo 'grel): sbyar nas 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu skyabs gsum sngon du 'gro ba can gyi byang chub kyi sems bdag la stsol cig ces lon gsum du gsol po gdab par bya'o// de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des kyang nus
369a3(mdo 'grel): po ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin no zhes khas blang ngo // de nas+ye saM phyogs yid du 'od par de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nAm/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/ ri mo bzhugs su
369a4(mdo 'grel): gsol te/ chu dri zhi ma pos sku khrus gsol la/ gos dkar pos phyis nas na bza' sna tshogs gso te/ 'og na chad pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor rnams byas nas/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog le sogs
369a5(mdo 'grel): pas phyi rol gyi mchod pa bya'o// me tog bdug pa mar me dang / dri dang lha bshos nyid dang ni/ na bza' dang ni rgyan dang gdugs// gar dang rol mo glu dbyangs ni/ yid 'ong sangs rgyas spyod yul dag/ na mkha'
369a6(mdo 'grel): mtha' dag kun khebs pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni/ blos sprul nas ni bdag 'bul lo// zhes yid kyis mchod pas mchod par mdzad do// mchod par bya ba dang / mchod par byedad pa dang / mtshad
369b1(mdo 'grel): pa rnams rang bzhin gyis dbyer med par dmigs te/ d+hI ltar 'jam dbyangs la sogs pa/ rgyul ba rnams la mchod mdzad pa/ de bzhin bdag gi de bzhin gshegs// mgon po zas dang bcas rnams mchod
369b2(mdo 'grel): ces sgrub pas mchod par bya'o// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// chos dang cho gas kyi mchog bcas la/ zhing rdul kun gyi grangs snyed kyi/ lus btud nas ni bdag phyag 'tshal zhes lan gsum
369b3(mdo 'grel): byas la/ rgyal dang de sras rnams la bdag gis ni/ bdag gi lus kun rnam pa kun du 'bul/ sems dpa' mchog rnams bdage ni yongs bzhis shig/ gus pas khyed kyi 'bangs su mchi bar bgyi zhes bya
369b4(mdo 'grel): bo 'dis bdag gi lus sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya'o// de'i rjes la thog ma med ldan 'khor ba nas// tshe rabs 'dri 'am gzhan dag la// bdag gi ma 'tshal sdig bgyis pa 'am/ bgyid du stsal pa nyid da
369b5(mdo 'grel): ni/ gti mug 'khrul pas bdag non te/ rjes su yi rang gong bgyis pa// de nis 'gyod pas shin tu yang / 'gyod par bgyis te bdag 'chags kyis/ 'dren pa rnams kyi nyes pa la// nyes pa legs par gzung
369b6(mdo 'grel): du gsol// 'di ni bzang po ma lags pas// mgon po slan chad bdag mi bgyid/ ces nyes pa thams cad bshags pa byas nas// zag bcas zag pa med pa yi/ dge la dga' bas yi rang ngo // chos kyi 'khor
370a1(mdo 'grel): sgyur smad du/ sangs rgyas rnams la bdag bskums// rnal bya mya ngan dus pa skyed rnams// bskul ba mthar yas bya zhugs smra gas la/ bdag gis dag tshul bsdus med par rdugs
370a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu bsngob zhes brjed pas bsod nams la rjes su yi ring ba dang / sangs rgyas la bskul ba dang / gsal ba gdab pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba byas nas/ dkan mchog gsu ma la sgrubs su 'a
370a3(mdo 'grel): n+d+heno// des ra la mngon du phyogs shing tsog cig pur 'jug ste/ !mo sbyar nus gan sa pa la rigs kyi bu khyud kyis 'di skad ces brji cig ces sgyur gzhug ste/ phyogs btsun bzhugs pa
370a4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po can rnams kyang bdag la dgongs sku gsol// slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas
370a5(mdo 'grel): la sog/ sa pa la mchod pa la sogs pa bgyis pas/ byang chub snying por ma chos kyi bar// sangs rgyas lnga ni skyabs su mchi/ chos dang byang chub sems dpa' yi// tshogs la'ang de bzhin sgrubs su mchi//
370a6(mdo 'grel): zhes la na gsum brjod par bya'o// de'i rjes la/ lus dang de bzhin longs spyod dang / dus gsum gyis ni dge ba rnams// sems can don sgrub bya ba'i phyir/ ba ltos pa med par btang bar bgyi/ sa sogs
370b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba che na po dang / nam mkha' bzhin du rtag par yang / sems can dpag tu med pa yi/ rnam mang nyer 'tsho'i bzhi rwa yang shog/ de bzhin na mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam kun du/ thams
370b2(mdo 'grel): cad mya ngan 'das par du// bdag ni nyer 'tsho'i rgyuru yang shog/ mgon po'i spyan sngar rdzogs pa yi// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// sems can de dag thams cad kun/ sangs rgyas bde la 'gron du 'bod
370b3(mdo 'grel): ces smin pa'i mtshan nyid mngon du byas so// de nas/ ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis// byang chub thugs ni bskyed pa dang / de dag byang chub thugs bsrangs la// dus kun tu ni gnas pa ltar// de bzhin
370b4(mdo 'grel): 'gro yi phan don du/ bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed cing / de bzhin du ni dus kun du/ byang gi gis do ni bsrung por bgyi zhes lan gsum gyi bar du smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems bzung bar bgyi'o// de nas
370b5(mdo 'grel): gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gzung ba la mos pa bstan po gzung ba la yod na de'i tshe sdom pa sbyin no// ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis// byeng chub sems dpa'i bslab bzung ste/ de dag byang sems bslab
370b6(mdo 'grel): ba la// rim po bzhin du gnas pa ltar/ de bzhin 'gro la pan don du/ byang chub sdom pa bzung be gyi zhing // de bzhin bslab pa de dag la/ rim pa bzhin du gnas par bgyi zhes lan gsum brjod pas sdom pa sbyin
371a1(mdo 'grel): no// ltung ba dang ltung ba med pa'i gzugs brnyan yang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan par bya'o// de nas langs te dkon mchog gsum la phyag btsal
371a2(mdo 'grel): nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs te nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du yon phul nas/ de ring bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// mi yi srid pa legs par thob/ de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes//
371a3(mdo 'grel): sa ngang rgyas sras su bdag byur to// skyon med btsun pa'i rigs 'di la// ji ltar rnyog par mi 'gyur par/ de bzhin da ni rang rigs dang / mthun pa'i las ni bdag gis pa/ zhes bya bas mjug rgyas par bya'o//
371a4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen med na ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar bya'o zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba sngon du song ba can gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sdom po
371a5(mdo 'grel): gzung ba'i cho ga'o// de ltar byang chub kyi sems dang sdom pa gzung ba'i byang chub sems dpo'i tshogaso gnyis po spyod pas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa des na spyod pa la mngon par sbyar bar bya'o// de yang rnam
371a6(mdo 'grel): pa gsum ste/ las dang po po la ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/ yi dam gyi spyad pa'o// mos pas spyod pa'i spyod pa can la ni dge ba chos sdud ba'i tshul khrims gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/
371b1(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa'o// sa la bzhugs pa la ni sems can gyi don bya ba nyid gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/ sems can ston pa'i spyod pa'o// de la las dang po pa'i yi dam gyi spyod pa brjod pa'o// nang par langs
371b2(mdo 'grel): te/ oM pra kri te pau ri shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+harmAHpra kri te pa'i shud d+ho/ haM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs shing yongs su brtags pa'i chus gdong la sogs pa dag par bya zhing kun du spyod pa gtsang
371b3(mdo 'grel): pas/ sa phyogs yi du 'ong bi sa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs sam/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nAm/ thung ka bkram zhing / bAr snang l-i la yang phyog sa dus kun na
371b4(mdo 'grel): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid kyis dmyigs te/ au a ma le/ bi ma le/ ni ra ma le/ swa b+hA ba shud d+ho sA hA zhes brjod la/ chu dri zhim pos sku khrus gsol te/ gos dkar
371b5(mdo 'grel): bos phyis nas/ d+hi ltar rnyed pa'i gos dang rgyan rnams sngags 'dis dbulo/ oM a badz+ra waswA hUM/ oM a badz+ra laM ka ra hUM/ de nas mdun du mngon par phyog s+ya te/ bsdad pa/ oM badz+ra b+h+ra mi hUM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs
371b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i sa'i char/ oM badz+ro daM ka hUM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lci ba dang / chus kun du bzang po'i dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la/ oM badz+ra re khe hUM/ zhes bya ba sa dkyil 'khor btang nas lag pa
372a1(mdo 'grel): bkru'o// de nas dbus nas brtsams te/ dbus nyid kyi mthar thug par me tog sngags 'dis dgram mo// oM hU~M ma hA me ra be swA hA/ dbus su'o// shararA dang lho dang byang dang nub rnams su naM/ oM
372a2(mdo 'grel): yaM pUrba pI te ha ya swAh+ma/ oM lam ut+ta ra ku ra be swA hA/ A~M baM a pa ra go ta pa ri ye swA hA/ me dang bden bral dang dbang ldan dang rlung gi phyogs ngag tu ni/ oM yaHu pa dI pa yaM swA hU~M/ oM ra u pa dI pA ya
372a3(mdo 'grel): swA hA/ oM laHu pe dI pa ya swA hA/ oM baHu pa dI pa ya swA hA/ bar gyi shar dang lho dang byang dang nub rnams su ni/ oM ya ga dz+nyA rat+na ya swA hA/ oM ra pu ru Sha rat+na ya swA hA/ oM lasti rat+na yA swA hA/ oM pa
372a4(mdo 'grel): aM shwa rat+na ya swA hA/ me daM nga bde ni bral dang dbang ldan dang rlung rnams su ni/ oM ya kha~Mn+ta rat+na ya swA hA/ oM rA mA NaM rat+na ya swA hA/ oM lI ma hA nai rat+na yA swA hA/ oM bI tsakra rit+na ya swA hA/ oM hI A d+ho me ra
372a5(mdo 'grel): be swA hA/ zhi sa bya bas yang dbus su bzhag la dbul bar bya'o// de nas/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ oM dadz+nyA d+hU pe hUM/ oM badz+ra dwe paM hUM// oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ oM badz+ri nai thi d+ya hUM/ zhes bya bas ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog
372a6(mdo 'grel): dang bdug pa dang mar me dang dri dang lha bshos dag dbul bar bya'o// de nas/ rgyal po gang zag bla na me da pa yi/ sangs rgyas rnams ni tha mas cad dang / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa// kun gyi skul
372b1(mdo 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs sangs rgyas gang du bltams pa dang / gang du byang chub la reg dang / zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / zag med mya ngan 'das pa dang / bde gshegs gang du bzhugs pa dang / 'chag
372b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang ni bzhengs pa dang / seng ge lta bur gzims pa yi// gnas de la ni bdag phyug 'tshal// steng dang bar dang 'og ngag dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang / skur bcas sku ni med pa yi/ mchad
372b3(mdo 'grel): rten la ni bdag phyag 'tshal zhes bya bas lan gsum du phyag byas la 'dug ste/ rten gyi stobs la sogs pa rdzogs par bya ba'i don du phung po gsum pa gdon par bya'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yang rjes su
372b4(mdo 'grel): dran par bya'o// de nas byar snang l-i rang gi gzhi bdag dang / 'jidzag rten skyong ba rnams yid kyis dmigs te/ oM AHhU~M zhes bya bas lan gsum byin gyis brlabs pas bdud rtsir gyur par bsam yid kyis de
372b5(mdo 'grel): dag nyid l-i byin nas/ oM i kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ya nut+ta pan+d+ha tra taM oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod pas bdud rtsi nges tshim pa rnams rang gi gnas su song bar lha'o// de nas theg pa chen po'i mdo lnga dang /
372b6(mdo 'grel): de dang rjes su mthun pa dag las mdo gang yang rung ba ci nus kyis be ton nas/ sdu ga bsngal ba dang mgon med pa dag la gos dang zas la sogs pa tha na kham gcig tsam tshun chad byin la/ 'khor gsum
373a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su dag pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par bsdus nas smon lam 'di skad ces gdab po// phyogs bcu na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir
373a2(mdo 'grel): ji ltar 'jam dbyangs spyong mdzad pa// bdag gi spyod pa 'ang de 'drar shog/ ji srid nam kha' gnas pa dang / 'gro ba ji srid gnas kyi bar// de srid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ni/ 'joms pas bdag kyang gnas par shog/
373a3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid// thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/ rga nang 'chi ba'i dpa' glong 'khrugs pa yi// sring pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par shog/ de nas oM badz+ra mu zhes
373a4(mdo 'grel): bya byas dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol te/ de nas byang chub kyi sems dang bslab pa dran pa sngon du btang nas ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o// zan za ba'i dus su na sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gtor ma bya'o//
373a5(mdo 'grel): oM ha ri t+ye mA hA badz+ra yaklI Ni i di byA ling+ge gr-ih+Na grIh+Na k+ShiNA~Mzhes bya bas 'phrog ma li zan tshangs gnyis sbyin no// oM A grA piN+Da a shi b+huHswA hA/ zhes bya bsa? thog ma ra zla bi rnams la zan tshangs gcig sbyin la
373a6(mdo 'grel): ran pa tshod zin par zos nas/ oM Ats+tshi Sh+ye piN+Di i shi b+hUHs+t+r-ih+ma/ zhes bya bas lhag ma za ba rnams la lhag ma sbyin no// gal te nu sa pa yod na nyi ma phyed dang dgongs ka'i thun dag la yang de bzhin du bya'o//
373b1(mdo 'grel): nus pa med pa ni sngar ji skad brjod pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor bskyung nul byas la/ mchod pa dang phyag btsal ba yang byas nas phung po gsum pa bton te smon lam gdab po// de ni yi dam len pa'i cho ga'o// ting
373b2(mdo 'grel): nge 'dzin dang sems can mgu bar bya ba'i cho ga 'di/ mdo sde dang byang chub spyong 'jug dang bslab pa kun sa btus pa la sogs pa las shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dang yi dam gyi// cho ga bdag gis byas pa
373b3(mdo 'grel): las// dge ba thob pa gang yin des// 'gro ba byang chub bsten par sho ga/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa pa yi dam blang ba'i cho ga/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rnam par rgyal bas
373b4(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gor gyi mkhan po chen po su ma ti kIr+t+ti dang / zhu tshe nr-i gyi lo tsa ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus tau gtan la phub pa//
373b5(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsit+not+sa tA sam+ba rA bi d+hi kra ma/ bod skad du/ sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa'i tshe ga'i rim pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ngan song thams cad 'jig pa dang / sgrib pa
373b6(mdo 'grel): thams cad los grol zhing / rdzogs sangs go 'phang stsol mdzad pa// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang dam pa'i chos// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la yang // de bzhin byang
374a1(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' yi/ sdom pa'i rim pa bri bar bya// de la dang por sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du sang
374a2(mdo 'grel): bam/ dge ba'i shes gnyen la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ 'di skad ces gso la ba gdab par bya ste/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
374a3(mdo 'grel): dung / byang chu sems dpa' sa chen po la bzhugs po rnams kyis dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs skyed pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang slob dpon gyi bla na
374a4(mdo 'grel): med pa sa~Mng dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gsol zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod do// de ltar gsol pa btab nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni/ slob dpon dgongs su
374a5(mdo 'grel): gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bos dus 'di nas bzung nas/ ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su mchi'o// slob
374a6(mdo 'grel): dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas/ ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du chos rnams kyi mchog zhi pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos rnams la skyabs su mchi'o//
374b1(mdo 'grel): slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du tshogs rnams kyi mchog 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog
374b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o// zhes lan gsum du brjod do// de ltar skyabs su 'gro ba khyad par can byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang phyogs bcu'i sangs
374b3(mdo 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid kyi dmigs te/ phyag btsal ba dang / ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa la sogs par byas la/ slob dpon mdun du byas te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
374b4(mdo 'grel): pa'am tsog por yang rung bas 'dug ste/ thal mo sbya nas sems bskyed par bya ste/ phyogs bcu rnams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ slob
374b5(mdo 'grel): dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag maung 'di zhes pa gyi byas skye ba 'di dang skye ba~M gI zhan dang gzhan dag tu sbyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang / bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
374b6(mdo 'grel): bdag gis bgyis pa dang / bgyod du rtsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nges/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
375a1(mdo 'grel): dang / sa chen po la rab tu bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed par mdzad pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di
375a2(mdo 'grel): zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chen po lo sems bskyed par bya'o// sems can ma rgal ba rnams bsgral
375a3(mdo 'grel): par bgyi'o// ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi'o// dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o// yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes lan gsum du
375a4(mdo 'grel): brjod par bya'o// de ltar slob dpon med kyang bdag nyid byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pau shAkya thub pa dang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bsams
375a5(mdo 'grel): te/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa'i cho ga la sogs po byas nas/ gsol pa gdab pa dang slob dpon zhes pa'i tshig spangs pa'i skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i go rim gong ma bzhin du bya'o// de
375a6(mdo 'grel): ltar sems bskyed pa'i gang zag gi byang chub kyi sems sgrol bar bya ba'i phyir tha na nyin lan gsum mtshan yan gsum du/ sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la/ byang chub bar du bodag ni
375b1(mdo 'grel): skyabs su mchi/ bdag gis sbyin sngogs bgyis pa 'di dag gis// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog ces byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// byang chub kyi sems nyams par byed pa'i
375b2(mdo 'grel): chos bzhi las ldog par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bla ma dang mchod par 'os pa slu ba dang / gzhan 'gyod po'i gnas ma yin pa la 'gyod pa bskyed po dang / sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la zhe sdang
375b3(mdo 'grel): gis tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad la g.yo dang sgyus spyod pa'o// byang chub kyi sems mi nyams par byed pa'i chos bzhi la bslab par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ srog gi phyir
375b4(mdo 'grel): yang bsams bzhin du brdzun mi smra ba dang / sems can thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas gnas par bya'i g.yo dang sgros ma yin pa dang / sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la
375b5(mdo 'grel): ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed cing phyogs bcur yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod par bya ba dang / sems can 'ga' zhig dge ba la 'god pa nga dag bla bon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god kyi nyan thos dang /
375b6(mdo 'grel): ring sangs rgyas la ni ma yin no// khyad par du mngon par shes pa myur du thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa'i chos bdun pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen
376a1(mdo 'grel): po'i mdo la bslab par bya'o// byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i phan yon ni/ sdong po bkod pa'i mdo la sogs pa las shes par bya'o// de la dang por cho ga bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed
376a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' thams cod kyi tshul khrims kyi bslab pa la legs par slob par 'dod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub
376a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho go shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa 'bogs pa'i sgo nas slob ma rjes su gzung bar nus po'i dag pa'i bshes gnyen la phyag byas te/ de'i rkeng pa la gtugs nas gsol
376a4(mdo 'grel): pa gdapa pa ni/ slob dpon khyod lngas bdag byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom par yang dag par blang ba de len par 'tshal gyis/ de la gnod pa ma mchis ni bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du cung zad cig
376a5(mdo 'grel): gsan cing stsal pa'i rigs so zhes de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba gdab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod nyon cig/ khyod 'di ltar sems can ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol pa dang /
376a6(mdo 'grel): dbugs ma phyung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyan mi 'chad par 'dod dam/ de las khyod kyis sems bskrad
376b1(mdo 'grel): pa brtan pa dang yi dam brtan par bya'o// gzhan yang 'dren pa'i ched du ma yin nam/ gzhan gyi nan gyis len du bcug pa ma yin nam zhes 'dri'o// de'i 'og du de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i lugs sku 'am ras
376b2(mdo 'grel): bris la sogs pa mdun du bzhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
376b3(mdo 'grel): mdun du bsams la/ ci nus pa'i phyi'i mchod pa lngas mchod pa dang phyag byas la/ de ma thag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen sta nu mthon po la 'dug pa la ston pa'i 'du shes kyis phyag byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
376b4(mdo 'grel): lha nga sde la btsugs pa 'am cog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nod pas 'di ltar bskul bar bya ste/ slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa'i
376b5(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa bdag la myur du stsal du gsol zhes de ltar lan gsum du dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bskul nas/ de nas dge bo'i bshes gnyen la byang chub sems dpa'i
376b6(mdo 'grel): sdom pa nor pa de dag la 'di skad ces dri ba bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod byang chub sems dpa' yin nam/ byang chub tu smon lam btab ba ma zhes dris pa na/ len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des kyang btab
377a1(mdo 'grel): lags so zhes khas blang bar bya'o// de nas mi zad pa dpag tu med pa bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi gter chen por gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas
377a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ring po mi thogs par thob par 'gyur ro zhes snyam du bsam zhing sems rab tu dang bar gyur pas dga' ba dang bcas pas cad mi smra bar thal mo sbyar te 'dug par bya'o// de
377a3(mdo 'grel): nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad dang tshul khrims thams cad de/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul
377a4(mdo 'grel): khrims dang / dge bcos sdung pa'i tshul khrims dang / snron gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims mdor bsdus pa slob ma la go bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi slob pa'i gzhi rnams dang byang chub sems
377a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khri mas de dag ci bdag las len par 'dod dam zhes slo pa ma la 'dri bar bya'o// des de ltar len par 'tshal lo zhes khas len par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa sbyin
377a6(mdo 'grel): par bya ste/ btsun pa 'am/ tshe dang ldan pa 'am/ rigs kyi bu ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod bdag byang chub sems dpa' ming 'ang zhes bya ba las/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhi'i
377b1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims su gyur pa gang yin pa dang / ma byon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa ngang tshul khrim su gyur pa gang yin pa dang da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nad lta glu
377b2(mdo 'grel): tshu la tshad kyi bslab pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa dang // khris su gyur pa gang len pa'i bsrang pa gzhi gang ga mug brims gong dga' 'das kyi rgya tu 'an ga rdzokha par gyur pa dang / nga ltar ma byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyis slob par 'gyur ba
377b3(mdo 'grel): dang / phyogs bcu dag na da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du ltar slab pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims thams cad de/ sdom
377b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshul khrims dang dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims nod dam zhes smros shig/ des kyang nod lags so zhes smros shig/ de ltar slob dpon gyis lan gsum
377b5(mdo 'grel): gyi bAr du lan nAm zhes brjod cing slob mas rab tu len lags so zhes lan gasgom brjod pas sdom pa blang bar 'gyur ro// de nas dge ba'i bshes gnye na des/ slob ma la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom
377b6(mdo 'grel): pa byin nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces lan gsum brjod par bya ste/ byang chub
378a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya bsu/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang bar bya ba lan gsum gyi
378a2(mdo 'grel): bar du mnos lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'dri zhes bya ba 'dis/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'ong zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ gang gi/ 'dis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims
378a3(mdo 'grel): kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dpeng du gyur par 'phags pa'i mchog lkog tu gyur kyang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthas gtugs pa'i chos thams cad lkog
378a4(mdo 'grel): du mi gyur pa'i thugs mnga' ba thams cad la mkhyen par gsol lo zhes lano gsum gyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brjod de/ phyag btsal nas bla mra dang slob ma ljang
378a5(mdo 'grel): byar bya'o// de nas langs la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa mnos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod
378a6(mdo 'grel): nyon cig/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yod dog par len pa'i las brjod pa rdzogs pa de'i tshe phyog so bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ sangs
378b1(mdo 'grel): rgyurgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di lta bu'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di
378b2(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa mnos so zhes yid dgu par mkhyen par 'gyur ro// de lo sangs rgyas bcomyi ldan 'das
378b3(mdo 'grel): de dge dung byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis chos kyi brtsibs bu dang sman zla'i dgongs pa mdzad pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'phol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o// de nas
378b4(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i bshes gnyen des byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mying 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ byang chub sems pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa 'di
378b5(mdo 'grel): da pa med pa rnams kyi mdun du skye bar mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir dad pa med pa rnams la byang chubo sems dpa'i sdom pa rab tu bstan nu/ dad pa med pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa
378b6(mdo 'grel): lam dad pas spong bar byed de/ des na ji snyed byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la gnas pa la bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ba de snyed kyi bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung
379a1(mdo 'grel): mu dad pa de dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bsrung bar bya ba yin pas gzhan sdig pa las
379a2(mdo 'grel): bzlog par bya ste/ de'i phyir mchog tu dge ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o gsong bar bya yin no// de nas bslab pa'i gzhi pham pa'i gnas su gyur pa sdom pa 'jig pa'i rgyu bstan cing / nyes byas kyi ltung
379a3(mdo 'grel): ba nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa yang bstan par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdor bsdus pa byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
379a4(mdo 'grel): khrims kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon chen po dpal ma me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//
379a5(mdo 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dong / zho chen gyi tshe lots+tsha ba da ge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgrer ba lags so// // slad kyi paN+Di ta de nyid dang / lots+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyul bas
379a6(mdo 'grel): bcos shing gtan la pha ba pa'o// / 6// byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gzung ba'i tshig slob dpon 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa bzhugs so// / rgya gar skad du/ ba~M d+hi satwa
379b1(mdo 'grel): NA bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gzung ba'i cho ga/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lto// bla med bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras bu skye ba yi/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag bsam shing ljon
379b2(mdo 'grel): sdom pa dam pa bskyed cing spel bar byed pa ste/ 'bras bu mchog des sems can tshogs rnams tshim par byed// 'dir nges par sdom pa gzung ba ni sdom pa 'bogs pa'i cho ga la mkhas shing
379b3(mdo 'grel): yin 'dod kyi sdom pa dang ldan pa'i bla mas gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod par bya ste/ dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma'i maN+Dal-i sngon du 'gro bas sem maN+Dal mod kyang rung ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag
379b4(mdo 'grel): pang 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rkang gnyis ma tshig mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs
379b5(mdo 'grel): su mchi'o// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs mchi'o// de ltar gsum mo// skyabs gsum yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen du bdag bzung du gsol lo// de'i rjes su
379b6(mdo 'grel): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ ji srid 'tsho'i b.radu srog gcod pa spang ngo // srog gcod pa las rab tu ldog par bgyi'o// de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa
380a1(mdo 'grel): las log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang myos par gyur pa bag med pa'i gnas las rab tu ldog par bgyi'o// de ltar gsum mo// deng
380a2(mdo 'grel): nas gzung bdag mchog gi dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes pa'o// de ltar 'di yon lag gsum yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yan lag lnga yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro// bsnyen gnas
380a3(mdo 'grel): kyi sdom pA nyin zhag gcig pa ni rtag tu myi 'dogs pa'i rgyan bzhag ste/ nyi ma shar ba nas sngar bzhin du gzung ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid
380a4(mdo 'grel): sad+d+he gi nyi ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod pa spong ngo // srog gcad pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o// de bzhin du mi byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / btsa
380a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i chang myos par gyur pa bag med pa'i gnas dang / khri stan mthon po dang / mil sten chen po dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / kha dog 'chang ba dang / gar dang glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / ltad mo blta ba
380a6(mdo 'grel): dang / duso ma yin pa'i kha zas las rab tu ldog par bgyi'o// dgra bcom pa yon tan brgyad kyis brgyan nas bzhugs pa bzhin bgyi'o// bdag gso sbyong gi tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs
380b1(mdo 'grel): pa 'di yang sems kyi rgyun dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / ma thob pa'i don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid thob pa gyur la cig/ de ltar gsum mo// de ltar 'di ni bsnan gnas yan lag brgyad pa'i sngam
380b2(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// sbyin par tsam yang dag pAr rU pa la dus 'di nus bzung skye dza srid nyi ma bar bya/ mtshan myi rnam zungs srings
380b3(mdo 'grel): nyi ma mu gyur gyi bar du zhes brjod par bya'o// gso sbyong gi sdom pa kho na ji srid tsho'i bar du len pa ni go ma'i niji srid 'tsho'ir bya'o// sems
380b4(mdo 'grel): dpa'i sdom pa don du gnyer bas de bzhin gags pa'i sku gzugs mdun du byas nas mchod pa byas te/ de'i mdun du dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma'i maN+Dal byas nas nye bar spyod pa lngas yang dag par mtshang
380b5(mdo 'grel): de/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rab tu dad pa yong dag par bskyed nas phyag byas te/ pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs pa 'am cog tsog por yang rung bas thal mo sbyar te mdun du
380b6(mdo 'grel): 'dug nas bla ma la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bdag khyod las byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par len pa de la spro yis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thogs
381a1(mdo 'grel): @brtse ba'i slad du gsol zhes de ltar gsum mo// bla ma des 'di lhur brjod de/ khyed kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab bam+ba/ bdag las byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa
381a2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin par 'dod dam zhes pa yang gsumo// des kyang 'dzin par 'tshal lo zhes dam bca' bar bya'o// bla ma las 'di skad du brjod par byi ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as
381a3(mdo 'grel): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / me nga
381a4(mdo 'grel): pha dang sems can gzhan la brten nas skye ba 'di dang gzhan rnams su sdig pa'i las gang cung zhig bgyis par gyur pa dang bgyid du stsal pa dang rjes su yi rung ba de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi'o// shes
381a5(mdo 'grel): shing dran pas mi 'chab po zhes lan gsu ma mo// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas gzung ste/ snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje
381a6(mdo 'grel): chen po dang ldan pa mkhyen pa thams cad ston pa 'jigs pa thams cad las 'das pa skyes bu chen po mo phyed pa'i sku bla na med pa'i sku la skyabs su mchi'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog zhi ba'i/
381b1(mdo 'grel): chos la skya bas su mchi'o// tshogs rnams kyi mchog phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan gsum mo// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bus mtha' yas pa'i
381b2(mdo 'grel): sems tso na gyi khams 'khor ba'i snga ga bsngal las bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir dang / gdon par bya ba'i phyir dang / yongs su bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir dang / thams cad ma khyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa la
381b3(mdo 'grel): rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ ji ltar 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma byon pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub tu sems bskyed do sangs rgyas pa dang 'tshang rgya ba dang 'tshang rgyo bar 'gyur pa/ ji lta ba bzhin
381b4(mdo 'grel): du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi so mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang / ji lta bo bzhi ma du chos rnams kyi chos nyid mkhyen cing rjesu
381b5(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa'i cho ga dris/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas slob dpon ming 'di zhes bgyi bo las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdun du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
381b6(mdo 'grel): chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes lan gsum mo// bdag gis sdig pa bshags pa dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yod
382a1(mdo 'grel): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// 'jig rten na skyob pa med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / gling
382a2(mdo 'grel): med pa rnams kyi skyobs pa dang / skyabs dang gnas dang / dpung gnyen dang / gling du 'gyur bar bgyi zhing / sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang / yongs su mi ldog
382a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bgyi ba dang / dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o zhes lan gsum mo// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi
382a4(mdo 'grel): bas de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khrims la ji ltar ma dang pa dang sring mo dang sngun zla dang bu dang bu mo de nga / gzhan yang nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams su gnas pa
382a5(mdo 'grel): de ltar rab tu glozung ngo // rab tu bzung nas kyang nus pa ji lta ba dang stobs ji lta ba dang snod ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed par bgyi'o// 'di nas gang cung zhig sbyin pa gtong bar 'gyur
382a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang / tshul khrims srung bar 'gyur pa dang / bzod pa bsgom par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan la sems mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ra ba dang / shes rab
382b1(mdo 'grel): rnam par dpyod par 'gyur ba dang / thabs mkhas pa la slob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
382b2(mdo 'grel): brtsams te sa chen po la rab tu bzhugs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag par byed pa des byang chub sems dpa' bdag slob pas 'di nas bzung nas bdag byang chub sems
382b3(mdo 'grel): dpar slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol zhes lan gsum mo// 'di dgra thams cad byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas
382b4(mdo 'grel): nas bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs so zhes bya'o// de 'dri ba'i bla ma yang med na rang gis yod dag
382b5(mdo 'grel): par bya ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba dang / slob dpon mying 'ong zhes bgyi ba bzhag nas/ 'di nas bzung nas bdag byang chub sems dparaM sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems
382b6(mdo 'grel): dpas gzung du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de ltar mkhyen par gsal ba'i mthar sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa dang / rtag tu 'di'i dge ba
383a1(mdo 'grel): mngon par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las gsungs pa'i cho ga bsdus pa'o// gzhung 'di'i bsod nams bdud rtsi yis/ sems can
383a2(mdo 'grel): yongs su tshim byas te/ mkhas pa 'jigs pa med pa ni/ kun rig dpage bsam go 'phong shog/ slob dpo ni mkhas pa chen po 'jigs me da 'byung gnas sbas pas smras pa'i sdom pa bzung ba'i cho ga
383a3(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// / kha na'i paN+Di ta chen ShA kyA shrI b+hu drA dang / chug lo ts+tsha ba dge sbyong dgra bcom gyis bsgyur ba'o// A ma
383a4(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa bzhugs so// / rgya gar skad du/ tri shi ra Na swa p+ta ti/ bod skad du/ gsum la skyebs su 'gro babadun cu pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dge snyan
383a5(mdo 'grel): gsum la skyabs 'gro ba// de ni sdom brgyad rtsa ba yin// sangs rgyas de'i chos dge 'dun ni/ thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs// dus gsum lam las nges grol zhing // shes bya la ni blo rnam rgyal/ rmong
383a6(mdo 'grel): zum pa bcom pas na/ sangs rgyas pod+ma ltar rnam rgyas// thog mtha' med pa'i srid pa ru/ ma rig gnyid kyis log pa yi/ 'gro la gang gang snang de de/ brdzun te rmi lam lho bur 'dod/ ma rig na
383b1(mdo 'grel): chad cing // yang dag ye shes nges 'byung bas// gang zhig rnam sad de sangs rgyas/ skyes bu gnyid sangs ji bzhin no// yang dag de nyid ston mdzad cing / mi mkhas sems can rto las mdzad pas/ des kya
383b2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas sangs rgyas dang / de yang sangs rgyas dang mtshungs 'dod/ ye shes bla na med pa yis// yang na de nyid thugs chud pa 'am/ zhi ba nyid kyis rtogs sangs rgyas/ de bas sangs rgyas sangs rgyas 'a
383b3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs kyi sku// mtshan dang dpe byang dge gis 'bar// 'gro ba rang gi mos pa yi/ dbang gi sna tshogs skur 'dzin gang / bsod nams tshogs ni tshad med las// 'khrungs pa de ni rgyal ba'i sla
383b4(mdo 'grel): sa bcu lnga ni gnas rnams kyis// mthong bar gyur po ste de yis// chos kyi rdzogs longs spyod 'di ni// rgyul sras rnams ni stong pa yin// rgyal ba sku de la bzhugs nas// bla med byang chub thugs su chud//
383b5(mdo 'grel): spros pa med pa gang / shes bya skye med pa lngas byung / sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos sku de/ ye shes tshogs las byung ba nAM/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// stobs dang ldan pa bco brgyad dang / sa
383b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas rnams kyi stobs sogs kyi sa/ ye shes de ni yang dge brgyan// ngo bo nyid ni rgyu rkyen las/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba rigs min te/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ni/ rang bzhin bcos ma yin par 'gyur
384a1(mdo 'grel): ngo bo nyid ni bcos ma ru// ji ltar yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ bcos ma ma yin ngo bo ni/ gzhan la bltos pa yod ma yin/ chos rnams nyid kyi ngo bo ni/ thams cad yod pa ma yin te/ de phyir
384a2(mdo 'grel): skad cig gcig gis ni/ bde gshegs thams cad mkhyen par 'dod/ ma rig nyon mongs can byas rtog/ rang gi ngo bo sgro btags 'dod// byis pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i rgyu/ de rtogs gyur pa log shes
384a3(mdo 'grel): yin/ ma rig nyon mongs med yod pas/ rnam pa kun mkhyen slangs pa nyid// slob ma rang sangs rgyas ngag gis/ byang chub dngos po med pa yin/ rgyal bas dngos po de rnams ni/ gzu gas rnyan dang
384a4(mdo 'grel): yang 'dra mkhyen pas/ gnyis med ye shes ma rig zang // shes bya skye med par rab phyi/ de bas de ni cung zad kyang // mi mkhyen ci yang ston mi mdzad/ srungs rgyasA na mkha' ji bzhin du/ de ltar chos nyid la rab bzhugs/
384a5(mdo 'grel): yid bzhin nor bu ci yang ni/ mi 'byed rtog pa med na yang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin du/ tshim par byed pa yin par bshad// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rin chen ni/ rang gi mos bzhin dgongs mdzad pas// 'gro ba'i
384a6(mdo 'grel): bya ba de dang ni// de bzhin mdzad pa ro go ba yin/ de yi phyir na 'phags pa rnams// bas mo mi khyab pa'i rkyen las 'khrungs/ yid ba zhin nor bu'i bya ba ni/ mthong la 'thad pa yod ma yin// chos rnams dngos
384b1(mdo 'grel): med nyid la ni/ blo gnas sangs rgyus yin par bshad/ 'og min gzhal yas khang du ni/ yang dag mngon sum yin par 'dod// sangs rgyas rtog pa mi mnga' ba'i// gzugs kyi skur ni yang dag 'byung / sprul pa
384b2(mdo 'grel): skus ni sa steng du'ang / yang dag byang chub ston par mdzad/ thub dbang rnams kyi sku gsum ste/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprulnga pa/ mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa 'di// gus pas blo la bzhag par gyis/ smyon
384b3(mdo 'grel): myed pa las sma r+ya byung zhing // byung nas kyang ni yang dag med/ rang gi dA bo 'dzin pas rgyas// don dam par mI da do// gang zhig rgyal ma sgyu me dang // rgyu zla lta bur sgra byed pa// skyes sogs dang ldan de skang
384b4(mdo 'grel): choste sbyang bar n+ti ro glus ma yin/ dus gsum du yang dang sna gcig phyir// rdo bo nyid kyis rtag tu 'byung // rga shi dag las grol ba nyid// chos hU~M rnams kyi ni chos shes pa spyod// zang dang chags bral mye dran 'dus
384b5(mdo 'grel): 'gog dang sdod pa nyid zhi ga/ de bzhin nyid kyang chos rnams kyis// rang gi ngo bo de nyid bshad// lam gling mya ngan 'das 'gro ba/ thub pa rnams kyis yang dag gsungs// de yi rgyud las skyes gyur paso// des ni mngon
384b6(mdo 'grel): sum ngag tu gzigs// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa bzhi/ rtogs te shes nas deng gyur pas// skyes bu gang zag zung brgyad po// mi phyed dge 'dun zhes bshad do// nyon mong se gnom phyir slob pas ne/
385a1(mdo 'grel): zag bdun ni slob pa yin/ nyes pa ma lus zad pa'i phyir// brgyad pa mi slob par bshad do// de rnams 'bras bur gnas pa bzhi/ bzhi ni zhugs pa po yin la/ ston pa'i slob ma'i tshogs
385a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni/ grol dang grol ba'i lam la gnas// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni/ bdud rnams bye ba brgya yis kyang / gang phyir dbye bar mi nus pa/ de phyir dge 'dun zhes bshad do// thub dbang gi ni sku gsum dang /
385a3(mdo 'grel): mya ngan 'das dang gang zag brgyad// sdom brtson bcas la mos pa yis/ gang zhig gsum l-i skyabs 'gro pa/ dge bsnyen du ni dam bcas pas/ skyabs ni gsum po bsrung bar bya/ mu stegs kun la gus
385a4(mdo 'grel): po yis// mchod dang phrag 'tshal mi bya'o// rten gyi dam pa blang nas ni/ slar yang dman la brten gyur na/ nyes byas phyogs la gnas pa'i phyir// de ni ngom pa'i bzhed gang 'gyur// gang zhig 'i phags lam me skyes
385a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ byis rmongs sngo so'i skye bo dgra/ de ni slob dang mi slob pa/ min zhes bstan bcos las bshad do// ji ltar 'khor lo la sogs pa// nyer bzung 'khor lor btags pa ni/ yang dag gzhan du rnam dpyad pos
385a6(mdo 'grel): rnam pa kun du mi dmigs so// de bzhin phung po na si brtsams te/ sems can du ni btags pa yang / yang dag gzhan du dpyad byas pas/ ci nas kyang ni dmigs mi 'gyur/ de 'dir thar pa'i cha nas ni/
385b1(mdo 'grel): brtsams te rtag tu dge ba la// nyan thos nyid phyir 'brad na ni// rim gyis nyan thos nyid du 'gyur// gang zhig rang byung ye shes 'dod// rang rgyal byang chub don gnyer bsdu// rtsol ba de yang rang rgyal gyis/ byang chub
385b2(mdo 'grel): kho na nges 'thob bo// rang don la gzhol 'di dag nI/ snying rje chen po dang bral bas// rang rgyul rgyal ba'i gsung las skyes// theg pa chen por mi bsngags so// rgyal ba'i yon tan mtha' yas paM/ theg pa tsha las
385b3(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu thos nas/ des ni snod nyid 'gyur ba yin/ des ni theg pa chen po'i shing / ma lus rang gi las kyi bsregs// byang chub sems dpa'i nang du ni/ skyes bu dbu
385b4(mdo 'grel): po lto bur gnas// 'di dag srid pasna stug pa yi// yid kyis byang chub gnyis thob pa/ tshe zad pAr ni dgar 'gyur zhing / mya ngan 'das thob 'du shes can/ de la mya ngan 'das yang min/ bon kyang srid grasum
385b5(mdo 'grel): skyes pa ni/ de dag la yang med mod kyi// zag pa med pa'i dbyingasna na 'khod/ mi shes nyon mongs min spang phyir/ phyis ni sangs rgyas kyis bskul bas// byang chub kyi ni tshogs bsags nas/ de yang 'jig/
385b6(mdo 'grel): rten 'dren par 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal po yi/ mtshan gyi yang dge brgyan pa la// blo dang ldan pa 'od blun po yis// rgyal po lta bur mtha bar mthong / nyan thos rang sangs chas dag gis// rdzogs
386a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi rigs byung ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan yang / thub pa'i dbang po lta bur mthong / byang chub sems ni legs bskyed pa'i/ sdom brtson mchil lham khur
386a2(mdo 'grel): ba las// byang chub sems sogs la gus pas// dgra bcom pa yis bzlog par bshad / shA ri'i lung las dgra bcom pas// byang chub sems dpa' phyag byas nyid/ 'di dag dkon mchog gsum
386a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan min/ sangs rgyas khongs su gAtogs par 'dod/ ji ltar dgra bcom zid ye shes// sa bdun mngon du 'gro ba can/ de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas ye shesau// sa bcu sngon du 'gro ba yin/ 'di ni
386a4(mdo 'grel): gcig pu mI 'gro yis/ sa bcu pe ni spyod byed de/ gang phyir pha rol phyin pa bcus/ sa de rnams la rdzogs par byed/ 'bras bur gnas dang zhugs pa ni/ 'phags pa'i lam gyis rab phye ba'i/ slob
386a5(mdo 'grel): pApa rnams kyi sa bdun ni/ mngon pa'i chos las ji skad bshad/ de bzhin sde snod rgya sna pa las/ sa bcu'i posngags pa brjod pa yin// thams cad 'phags lam bdag nyid can/ de las 'phags
386a6(mdo 'grel): min ji ltar 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyi dbang mdzad nas/ sde snod gsum du 'dzi meng po yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i senas skabs kyi/ nges pa der ni yod ma yin/ 'phags pa nub kyi rar bshad dang //
386b1(mdo 'grel): shar gyi ri pa'i nyan thos kyis// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang byas pa/ sde snod bdun du bshad pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang / de bzhin rig 'dzin zhes bya dang / mdo sde chos mngon 'dul ba dang /
386b2(mdo 'grel): rgyas dang de bzhin skyes pa'i rabs// de ltar sde snod bdun po ni/ lung ni gnyis las bstan pa yin/ gang la de ni tshang min 'gyur// dwe nI dgra bcoMm sbyangs pa nyid / shes bya mtha' yas dbang gis
386b3(mdo 'grel): na/ 'khor bA na ni skad cig yod// gal te re re'i dbye bas ring // de bzhin 'di yang srid mtshungs 'gyur// bya ba rgya chen byed pa'i phyir/ srid pa ring mnyam mi semaso so// bsod nams ye shes
386b4(mdo 'grel): stobs kyis ni// lus sems sdug bsngal gyis mi non/ de bas rnam pa thams cad du// byang chub sems dpa'i slong mi bya// khams gsum par gtogs nyon mongs zad / byang chub kyi ni snod
386b5(mdo 'grel): gyur nyid/ phung po khams dang / skye mchid rnams// gzugs brnyan mtshungs par ma thong bas ne/ nyan thos 'di sangs rgyas dag ni/ stong ni gnyis dang gsum po mthong / rnam pa kun mkhyen ya
386b6(mdo 'grel): shes ni/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yin par bshad/ rgyal bas la ma gyi rnam par shes/ byang chub sems dpa' yin par gsungs/ rab tu dga' ba thob pa na/ kun sbyor gsum po logs zad pas/
387a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags 'gyur zhing / rdzogs sangs rigs las byung ba yin// sa ni gong ma gong ma la// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang / nyes zad gang yin sa
387a2(mdo 'grel): bcu pa'i/ madro nyid las ni shes par bya/ yon tan dam pa re re zhing / mtha' yas de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam// byang chub la sems rtag phyag 'tshal/ blo ldan byang chub la skyabs mchi// theg chen tshul
387a3(mdo 'grel): la brten nas nI/ skyabs gsum rnam por phye ba las// bsod nams gang nges 'jig rten rnams/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog gzhol-i shog/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bdun cu pa// slob dpon
387a4(mdo 'grel): zla ba grags pa'i zhil sta nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgyu gar g+hi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po di pa~M kA rA shrI dz+nyA nA dang / sgra bsgyu gyi mo tsA ba dge slong rin po zing pos 'i sbyar

387a6(mdo 'grel): yon lag drug pa bshad/ cis 'gro dgos dang yul dus dang / phan yon bslab bya blang ba rnams// rtso ba sdom du bshad pa yin/ 'jigs dang yon tan dran pas 'gro/ gnas gsum bstan pa'i
387b1(mdo 'grel): yul de la/ 'di nas byang chub thob par ro// mu stegs spyod las log pa yin/ gsum du mi skye rten du 'gyurar/ bar chad med pas nad myung ring / 'byung zhing sogs pa'i phan yon ni/ skyabs
387b2(mdo 'grel): gsum dang po'i bslab bya ni/ gnod sbyin mi bsten phyag mi 'tshal// gnyis pa sems can thams cad la/ 'tshe ba spang zhing brtse bar bya/ gsum po bdag dang gzhan gyi yul// sdig pa can
387b3(mdo 'grel): dang 'grogs pa min// sku gzugs tshigs su bcang po dang / ldan pa ser po btab pa la/ dang mos sgo nas brtan par brtag/ zhal nas gsungs pa mtha' dag la/ skur pa mi gdub spyi bor blang
387b4(mdo 'grel): gang zag dag dang ma dag la/ dam par blta bar bya ba yin// lus srog phyir yang gsum mi spang / dus 'dir rkyen yang ci byang yang / mgon skyebs gzhan du btsal ba min/ che ba'i yo na tan zad
387b5(mdo 'grel): dag gis/ rtag tu dran cing mchod pa yin/ rkyen gyi stobs 'gro brjod bya bya/ dus drug rgyun gyis bskul ma yin/ blang ba dang por shes bya ba/ 'jigs pa byung tshe bskul ma yin/ rgyud la shes
387b6(mdo 'grel): bya mang mchis kying // rgyal blon yid ches ma gyur pas// skyabs 'gro'i cho ga pa dag gis bshad // legs par bris shig ku mA ra/ bsod nams 'gro ba yongs la bsngo// skyabs 'gr-i yan lag
388a1(mdo 'grel): drug pa/ slob dpon bi ma las mdzad pa rdzogs so// / ltung ba bzhags pa'i cho ga paN+Di ta de ba shAn+ti sa mdzad pa bzhugs so// / rgya gar skad du/ a pat+ti de shA na
388a2(mdo 'grel): bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ ltu nga baM bshags pa'i cho ga/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol// bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba byas pa nyid dang ni/ mi
388a3(mdo 'grel): shes pa nyid kyis 'di da chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / phrag dog dang / srer sna'i dbang gis/ lus ma bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa dang / dran pa nyams pa nyid kyis/ lus dang

388a5(mdo 'grel): mdzad du gsol gyis bzod par gsol ba de gyis bzod par mdzad du gsol/ khyed la ji ltar bzod par gsol ba de bzhin du mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos dang lta ba mthun
388a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba dang / gtsu ga lag khang dang brang khong na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha dang / lam dang nye ba'i lam na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha dang / bstan pa 'di la mngon par dga' ba'i lha
388b1(mdo 'grel): dang / gzhan bgyid pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang / pha dang / ma dang / gtong ba po dang / sbyin bdag dang / ji srid srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi sems can de/ 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang bcas
388b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang / nag po chen po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la nongs pa bgyis pa gang lags pa de bdag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po la sogs pa yongs su
388b3(mdo 'grel): rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bzod par gsol gyis/ bzod par mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin du ldan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yin no legs so// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol
388b4(mdo 'grel): bA dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ltung ba rigs lnga po dag la/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sbyor ba dang / dngos gzhi dang mjug rnams su/ 'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang ba dang / zhe sdang
388b5(mdo 'grel): gis kun nas bslang ba dang / gti mu ga gis kun+da nas bslang ba dang / chad pas kun nas ba slang ba dang / skyed kyis kun nas bslang bya dang / skyed kyis kun nas bslang ba dang / de'i chen du
388b6(mdo 'grel): gtogs pa dang / de'i tshan du gtogs pa dang / de'i sder gtogs pa dang / de'i ris su gtogs pa dang / de'i mtshan nyid dang / de'i ngo bo nyid dang / nang du btsos pa dang / nang du zhag lon pa dang /
389a1(mdo 'grel): ched du byas pa dang / btang nas za ba dang / kham 'phror bcad pa dang / kha bkang nas smra ba dang / lag nyar blung pa dang / byin len ma byas pa dang / gseg 'jog byas pa dang / dus
389a2(mdo 'grel): ma yin pa 'i zas dang mdor na phas pham pa'i chos bzhi dang/ ngos kun nas bslang ba'i ltung ba sbom po sbyor ba dang dngos bzhi dang / mjug gis bsdum pa dang / dge 'dun lhag yi'i chos bcu gsum dang / des kun nas ga 'i nyes pa sgom pa sbyor ba dang / ngos gzhi dang / mjug dang / spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos su ma cu dang / des kun nas
389a3(mdo 'grel): bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi dang mjug dang / ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang / des kun na sa bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang / dngos gzhi dang mjug dang so sor bshags par bya
389a4(mdo 'grel): bi'i chos bzhi dang / des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dong dngos gzhi dang mjug dang / bslab par bya ba'i chos brgya rtsa mang po dang / des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi
389a5(mdo 'grel): dang mjug dang / rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun dang / des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang / dngos gzhi dang mjug ste/ de dag dang / gzhan yang gang spangs rgya sa kyis bcus pa'i
389a6(mdo 'grel): bslab pa dang / 'gal ba dang / dge 'dun gyis bcas pa'i nang khrims dral ba dang / goms pa dang / gus par ma bgyi ba de dag thams cad/ bdag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po la sogs pa yongs su
389b1(mdo 'grel): rdzogs par 'artse ba'i skud d+ma/ dge 'dun gyi spyan skA rarA mi 'chub pa'i sems kyis mthal la bshags so// mthal zhing bshugs na bdag ba ba la rlag par gnas par 'gyur gyi/ ma mtham ldanan/
389b2(mdo 'grel): nade ltar mi 'gyur la gas so// de bzhin du la ni gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ ltung ba de dag la ltung bar mthong ngam/ kha tsig la khrims lags/ phrin rgyung shin du lags par sdom sa ma/
389b3(mdo 'grel): smya 'aM dang / 'dris byA daM stA b+hU dang snron pa'i bstan pa dI s+thA ba bshin du legs pa ra sdom lags pa sa/ yang 'di ltar shes bzhin du hU~Mmed legs so zhes bya n+d+ha sa yin+da no/ khyin
389b4(mdo 'grel): byung ba ba shags pa'i tshu gyi thams su yid pa smra bA biN+DiH ba 'chis mi rdzogs pa/ ba ba~M nu ba
389b5(mdo 'grel): chu sas rgyus b+h+yas b+hA smAr skyed thAsu t+ye gad+hAn+ta le pag+sa rA// rgyu gar skad du/ A pat+ti shAn kr-i d+d+hi/ ba skud du/ snang bya sa chog/ sangs rgya pa la byun
389b6(mdo 'grel): // rjem su mdzuyin pa 'i nim ma sogs pa phyags brdzun bzhugs pa sa ma mas dpe bams yang ba na na sa
390a1(mdo 'grel): su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'khor ba thog ma mchis pa nas tha ma da lnga la thug gi bar du 'dod chags dang / zhe srung dang gti mug gi dbang gis lus dang ngag
390a2(mdo 'grel): dang yid kyi sgo nas mi dge ba bcu bgyis pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba lnga dang / so sor thur pa'i sdom pa dang 'gol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang 'gal ba dang / gsang
390a3(mdo 'grel): sngags kyi dri ma tshig dang 'gal ba la sogs pa mdor na mtho ris dang mthar pa'i gegs su gyur cing / 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyur gyur pa'i nyes lhung gi tshogs ci mchis pa de dag thams cad
390a4(mdo 'grel): bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu nas bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / btsun pa'i spyan sbyar ma thol lo// bshags so// mi 'thab bo// mthul
390a5(mdo 'grel): zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la rig par gnas parI 'gyur gyi/ ma mthol ma bshags na de ltar mi 'gyur ba lags so zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas mthong sdom dril la thubs yin no//
390a6(mdo 'grel): legs so zhes brjod do// dang por sbyor ba'i cho ga ni be dag ming / 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas kyi nyon mongs pa mang ba 'am/ bag med pa la sogs pa'i stobs kyis
390b1(mdo 'grel): nyes lhung gi tshogs mang po bdog ste mchi bas/ de dag dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar bshags par 'tshal bas/ thugs kyis bzung 'tshal zhes pa dang / mjug ltung ba las bslang ba
390b2(mdo 'grel): shin du bka' drin che lags zhes pa dang / chos bzhin du mdzod pa rjes su yi rAng zhes brjod par bya'o// ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon mar mo mdzad ye shes kyis
390b3(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khri mas rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
391a1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsa tu raM ga d+harmA tsar+ya/ bod skad du/ chos spyod yan lag bzhi pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// ston pa bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ni
391a2(mdo 'grel): snying po byang chub mchis kyi bar// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum skyob pa bla na medo// rab tu gus pas skyabs su mchi// rteni gzung bar bya ba'i phyir skyabs su 'gro ba'i yan lag ste dang po'o// slob dpon bdag la
391a3(mdo 'grel): dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// thog med du so nas da lta'i bor// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis// lus dang ngag dang yid sgo nas// sdig po mi dge ci bgyis pa// ma lus 'gyod pas so sor bshags// slan
391a4(mdo 'grel): chad ci nus bsdam par bgyi// rgyud dag par bya ba'i phyir sdig pa bshags pa'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o// slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol// phyogs bcu na mkha'i mthas gtugs na// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
391a5(mdo 'grel): nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // 'jig rten pa ni gang gis kyang // ma lus dge ba ca gyid pa// de la rang nyid byed pa pas// lhag par dga' bas yi rang ngo // dge ba'i rtsa ba tshegs chung ngus bskyed pa'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba'i yan lag ste/
391a6(mdo 'grel): gsum pa'o// slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol// ji ltar sngon gyi skyob rnams kyis// sems can nam gyi don gyi phyir// byang chub mchog rab thugs bskyed pa// de ltar bdag kyang ma rnams phyir// byang chub mtshig tu sems bskyed do// bla na
391b1(mdo 'grel): med pa'i byang chub nges par bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o// mthar dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis don phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub mchog tu bsngo ba'i yan lag kyang bya ste// bdag gis bsod nams
391b2(mdo 'grel): de yis ni// sems can thams cad ma lus pa// gdul dkA'i sems ni rab zhi nas// 'gro ba'i bla ma thob par shog/ ces bya ba'o// chos spyod yan lag bzhi pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga mai tA nan+das mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
391b3(mdo 'grel): 'byor dbang phyug de nyid dang / lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ sob+h+rUM ga sat+tarma r-Ir+yA ba ta ra/ bod skad du/ dam pa'i chos spyong la 'jug pa'i yan lag bdun pa/ de bzhin
391b4(mdo 'grel): shegs pa shAk+Sha seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags tshogs ni// skyabs mchog bden gnyis yongs su bzung bas// shes rab snying rje mnyam sbyor ba// bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal ba'i
391b5(mdo 'grel): yan lag ste dang po'o// skyab so gsum bla med rin chen la// phyi nang kho na nyid don can// mchod sbyin bsam mi khyab rnams kyis// logs par mchod pa'i cho gas mchod// mchod pa 'bul ba'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o// 'gro rnams
391b6(mdo 'grel): pad+ma la 'dod bsam pa yis// sangs rgyas tshes dang dge 'dun la// byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar// rtag tu gus pas skyabs su mchi// skyabs su 'gro ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o// bdag gi lus ngag yid sgo nas// mi zad sdig
392a1(mdo 'grel): pa gang bgyis dang // bgyid stsal rjes su yi rang gang // de dag thams cad so sor bshags// sdig pa bshags pa'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o// rdzogs spangs byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal
392a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i slob ma dang // 'jig rten bsod/ nams gang bgyid la'ang // dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo // rjes su yi rang ba'i yan lag ste lnga pa'o// shes rab snying rjes dang bcas pa'i// bo rnon pos sems can don du bdag/
392a3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas mdun du gnas bgyis te// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyid// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i yan lag ste drug pa'o// bsod nams tshogs kyi chos 'di dag/ byang chub gsum gyi rgyur gyur pa// bdag
392a4(mdo 'grel): med gnyis kyi lam brten nas// mtho ris thar pa sgrub gyor cig/ bdag gi bsod nams gong bgyis pas// skye bos rgyal ba thob gyur te// gus pas sems can thams cad don// rgya chen yang dag byed gyur cig/ bdag ni tshe rabs
392a5(mdo 'grel): thams cad du// sangs rgyas mthong ba nyid gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos ni nyan pa dang // dge 'dun rnabs 'bring byed gyur cig/ thabs mkhas yang dag bshes gnyen ldan// chos dang zang zing sbyin byed cing // longs spyod sem can thun
392a6(mdo 'grel): mong dang rnga pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs shog/ 'byor pa phul ba'i bsod nams dang // tshul khrims legs par bzung ba dang // dam chos yang dag mnyan pa yis// bdag ni byang chub mchog thob shog/ bdag ni lo nas shi 'dzas
392b1(mdo 'grel): dga' ldan skyes nas yid dge bas// myur du byams mgon mnyes byas te// byang chub lung bstan rnyed par shog/ smon lam gdab pa'i yan lag ste bdun pa'o// dam pa'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i yan lag bdun pa/ kha che'i paN+Di tA
392b2(mdo 'grel): chen po shAkya shrI b+ha d+hus mdzad pa rdzogs so// padz+ro ta chen po de nyid dang / bod kyi la tsA ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// sa ma kyi kyi ma la mangs su pa sa
392b3(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bi d+hi satwa s+ya marga kra ma saM gra ha/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsum bdag nyid kun khyab
392b4(mdo 'grel): rtag/ ye shes thugs rje dbyer med pas// sems can don kun bsgrub mdzad pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas la gus phyag 'tshal// gdul bya'i skye bo rjes bzung phyir// byams dpal lo tsIs rab bskul bas// rgyal sras lam rim mdor
392b5(mdo 'grel): bsdus ni// bdag gis ji lhor bzod ltar brjod// thog mar bshes gnyen bsten bya ste// de yi legs spyad yon tan blang // de yang sems can don btsun nus// sheso sogs yon tan pha rol phyin// phun tshogs ngal ba myur du 'jig/
392b6(mdo 'grel): las dang de 'bras sdug bsngal yin// de spong shes rab snying rtse bsgom// kun mkhyen bstan pa'i snying po'o// mi khom brgyad spangs 'byor bcas pa'i// ngal ba phun tshogs rnyed dka' ste// rgya mtsho che ro yangs shing bug tu// rus sbal mgrin
393a1(mdo 'grel): chung dang mtshungs gsungs// de yang mi rtag mdun gnas te// skad cig mi sdong rnam par 'jig/ 'du byed sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'dir// chos dang gang zag bdag med nyid// de bzhin nyon mongs nye nyon mongs
393a2(mdo 'grel): lus ngag yid kyis bskyed pa yi// dge dang mi dge kun 'byung ba// las dang nyon mongs ming gis gdags// sdig pas ngan 'gror lhung 'gyur te// sdug bsngal sdug bsngal 'thob par 'gyur// dge bas lha dang mir 'phen mong // de yang
393a3(mdo 'grel): yongs 'gyur sdug bsngal nyid// de bas sems can don sgrub phyir// byang chub sems bskyed de yi rgyun// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can// bsgom bya lam gyi mchog yin no// lus dang tshor ba sems dang chos// phyi nang gnyis bdag
393a4(mdo 'grel): tshul lus kyi// ma tshan nyid rjes rtags mnyam 'jog pa// dran pa nye bor gzhag bzhi pa sgom// dge chos bskyed cing rnam 'phel dang // sdig semos mi skyed nyer 'joms pa// bde gshegs kyis gsungs skyon sel phyir// yang
393a5(mdo 'grel): dge spong ba bzhi rab bsgrags// 'dun dang brtson 'grus sems dang ni// dpyod pa'i bye brag gis phye ba// mi mthun mnyen po'i phyogs dbang gis// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhir 'dod do// drang dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang // ting 'dzin shes
393a6(mdo 'grel): rab ces grags pa// thar pa'i rgyu yi sbyor ba yis// rgyal sras dbang po lnga ro gsungs so// dad sogs rnam 'phel lnga thob pa// mi mthun phyogs 'joms zag bcas dang // zag pa med mtha' bsas 'di dag/ sangs rgyas rnams
393b1(mdo 'grel): kyis stobs zhes bstan// dran dang shes rab 'byed brtson 'grus// dga' dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang // ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms rnams// byang chub yan lag bdun du 'dod// yang dag ldan dang rtog pa dang // ngag dang las
393b2(mdo 'grel): mtha' 'tshe ba dang // brtson 'grus dran dang ting 'dzin ni// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad du bzhed// sangs rgyas kun gyi bgrod pa'i lam// byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun// blo ldan rnams kyis mnyan rjes su// zab yang
393b3(mdo 'grel): rjes 'brengs rtag tu bsgom// de la gsum ni tshogs kyi lam// gnyis rim nges 'byin yan lag dang // byang chub yan lag mthong lam ste// yan lag brgyad ni bsgom lam du'o// sdug bsngal me gsum gyis skrag pas
393b4(mdo 'grel): skye bo 'khor ba las dbyung phyir// snying brtse brtson 'grus dang ldan gyis// sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub blo gros bskyed// phung po bdag min de la bdag/ ldan min bdag kyang de min te// de ldan ma yin bya byed kyis// mthun dngos
393b5(mdo 'grel): mon bdag stong pa nyid// khyob dang rtag dang byed po dang // rang dbang longs spyod chos nyid can// bdag ni phung po dang 'gal bas// de phyir de gcig ji ltar 'grub// bya dang byed pa'i dngos po ni// rtog tu lhan cig srid
393b6(mdo 'grel): ma yin// de yang de ldan mo yin pas// de yi gzhan phyogs gsum yang ngo // phung po yang der rigs min te// de yis de ltar 'dod byas nas// rtag tu thar pa thob 'gyur te// gzugs sogs dngos bral ma
394a1(mdo 'grel): phyir ro// rgyu 'dra'i phyi rol gzung don med// de med der 'dzin yod ma yin// rnam rig tsam de shes de yang // gdong nas ma skyes de bdag med// brtse ba tsam gyis srid par 'phen// shes rab dman
394a2(mdo 'grel): bas mya ngan 'da'// de phyir phan tshun mnyam ldan pas// rgyal bas bla med lam du gsungs// the gu las sbrul 'dir bsal med// the gu'ang gsar gzhag ci yang med// mar mes the gu yang dag mthong // de mthong 'jigs pa
394a3(mdo 'grel): rnam par spangs// 'di la bsal bya ci yang med// bzhag par bya ba'ang cung zad med// yang dag nyid la yang dag lta// yang dag mthong nas rnam grol bshad// 'di dag dman par bsgoms na ni// 'phags lam byang chub dman
394a4(mdo 'grel): nyid 'thob// bsams sogs yang ni dman nyid kyis// bdag tu lta ba spang bar byed// rgya chen 'gro ba'i don bsgrub pas// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kho nas/ sku gsum byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// bdag gis 'di bsdus
394a5(mdo 'grel): bsod nams ni// bskrun gyur gang des skye bo kun// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas// 'gro la blade sbyin par shog/ dge slong shAkya'i dpal bzang ming // bdag kyang gdul bya lhan cig tu// byams mgon 'phags pa'i zhabs
394a6(mdo 'grel): pad drung // skyes nas de dgongs gsal byed shog/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rim pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa// dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla bral ba'i paN+Di ta chen po/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gsum par yongs su grags
394b1(mdo 'grel): y+YA smai \u0f88\u0f90sa k+Shi ba yang bsdu ma dang ba rdzogs su/ nA pan+d+ha rgyun pa deny-id dang ArbAd byazlas pa'i dpal ldan gyis rgyud nas lnga'i gtsug lag khang du bskrun pa / sh+tsaSh+maN+DA byung chubs dang /
394b2(mdo 'grel): da ma// mye der bsdus rim pa legs mthun pa hU~M// bsod nams bdag gis gang bsgrubs des/ 'gro kun ba gshegs myur tho shig/ lnga rig brtul zhugs dri'i yang rnam par rlung // bskrun pa'i snying po bsru pASh+Ta
394b3(mdo 'grel): myadzad pa// nyi 'og khams nas tshungs med gcig 'a 'i// gsung 'di phyogs su ny+tsi ltar rgyas myur ci 'theg pa'i

394b6(mdo 'grel): du' bra ba gyi grangs de skad ma ba na bye byas par gyur ro// dril phra ba phreng sa de snang meng bar myang gyi ltung yin ma kyi thus nga pa 'gyuro//
395a1(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// dang por 'jim pa brdung ba bdag gam gzhan yang rung bas byams pa dang snying rjes

395a4(mdo 'grel): dbul lo// de nas bsrid nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid// thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/ rga nad 'chi ba'i dba' klong 'khrugs pa yi// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par shog/ ces smon lam
395a5(mdo 'grel): gdab bo/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i sAts+tsha gdab pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mer me mdzad kyi ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa sogs so// // oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+he bA he tun+te ShA na ta thA ga to h+ya data te ShAny+tsa yo
395a6(mdo 'grel): ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/ !/ ma ba'i bya ba'i rim pa sador bsdus pa bzhugs/ rgya gar skad du/ gu ru kr-i ya kra ma/ bod skad du/ bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dang
395b1(mdo 'grel): bor tshad dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis/ slob ma la dang ba dang yid ches pa dang 'dod pa'i dang pa skyes la/ de nas byang chub kyi sems kyi phan yon brjod la spro ba bskyed par bya'o// de nas gnas khang khyad par can du mchod pa'i chos
395b2(mdo 'grel): khyad par can be shams la/ 'phags pa'i tshogs spyan drangs te/ phyag btsal ba dang / zhabs bsil zhing gang no 'bul ba dang / bla na yod pa dang / bla na med pa'i mo rnyed pa'i tshogs kyis legs par ma chong cing // mchod pa'i
