395b4(mdo 'grel): dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang bsngo ba la sogs pa bya ste/ de nas slob ma dod pa dang ldan pas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pas byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis legs par
395b5(mdo 'grel): bskyed la/ de dag gI rang gi ngo bo dang / dbye ba dang / khyad par yang brjod do// de nas byang chub kyi spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug da // bo sdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras pa
395b6(mdo 'grel): dang / bslab pa'i go rim dang / nyams pa dong ma nyams po'i skyon yon dang / tshul ji ltar bslab pa la sogs pa yang rgyas par bstan par bya'o// de yang bag yod pa dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pas zin par bya'o zhes bslab par
396a1(mdo 'grel): bya'o// de dag gi mtshan nyid dang / go rim dang / nyams pa dang mnyams pa'i skyon yon la sogs pa yang bslab par bya'o// de dag byed pa la yang brtson 'grus drag pos bskyed la ji mi snyam pa dang / sdug
396a2(mdo 'grel): bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang / ma yengs pa'i bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis rang bzhin med par shes par byas la/ bslab pa gsum mAm/ shes rab rnam pa gsum la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / spyod lam gyi tshul gyis
396a3(mdo 'grel): bslab par bya'o zhes bstan par bya'o// mthar smon lam gyis yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ces kyang brjod par bya'o// 'di ni slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i las kyi go rim mo// slob mas kyang tshul ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du
396a4(mdo 'grel): bslab par bri'o// 'di ni mtshan nyid theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed pa dang / bslab pa bstan pa'i tshul yang go rim che long sim bstan pa yin no// rgyas par ni gzhan nas shes par bya'o// bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa/ slob
396a5(mdo 'grel): dpon gyis bstan pa'i las kyi mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal s+thA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// kyi rim pa zhugs// rgya gar skad // tI sa~M ba ro kra ma/ bod skad du/ sdom pa gsum
396a6(mdo 'grel): gyi rim pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa slob pa la/ bsnyen gnas dbeg pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang por bya'o// bstan ga
396b1(mdo 'grel): dbog pa ni/ btsun pa 'am/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol// bdag dge bsnyen ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de bzhin du
396b2(mdo 'grel): lan gnyis lan gsum du bya'o// de ltar btsun pas bdag la gsum la skyabs su song bar bzung du gsol zhes bya'o// btsun pa'am slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag dge bsnyen ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di
396b3(mdo 'grel): nas bzung ste/ ji sring sang nyi ma shar gyi bar du/ sreg chags so cig gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi no re 'phrog pa dang / mi tshangs par spyad pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / myos byeng 'thung ba dang / dus ma yin par za ba dang / phreng
396b4(mdo 'grel): dang / kha dog bsgyur ba dang / gar dang / glu dang / cheng 'dzi dang / mal spyan mthon po la sogs pa ldeg par bskyed pa/ yon tan brgyad kyis bdag dgra bcom pa rnams kyi tshul du 'jig go zhes bya ba ni bsnyen gnas dpag
396b5(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa brjod cing / bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas le skyabs su mchi'o// theg pa chen po'i chos mtha' dag
396b6(mdo 'grel): la skyabs su mchi'o// tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// btsun pas bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol// thabs yin no// legs so// tshe dang ldan pa brjod cig/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ ji lta
397a1(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las log pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dus 'dri nas bzung ste/ ji srid 'tsho'i
397a2(mdo 'grel): bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa la slar ldog par bgyid do// yan lag dang po 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo// rjes su bsgrub po// rjes su bgyid ngo // gzhan yang
397a3(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas
397a4(mdo 'grel): spangs te/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes pas
397a5(mdo 'grel): kyang dus 'di nos bzung ste/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang myos par gyur pa bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ ma byin
397a6(mdo 'grel): par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par bgyid do// yan lag gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang /
397b1(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa dang / lnga pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su bslab bo// rjes su sgrub bo// rjes su bgying ngo // thabs yin no// legs so// dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dbog pa'o// ji ltar sangs rgyas
397b2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang deng nas bzung ste/ ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ sems can ma
397b3(mdo 'grel): rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang / sems can dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs phyin pa dang / sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'ongs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slang
397b4(mdo 'grel): dubyang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag gi de ring skyob pa thams cad kyi// sprin sngar 'gro ba bde gshegs nyid dang ni// bar du bde la mgron du bos zin gyis// lha dang lha min la sogs dga' ba bgyis//
397b5(mdo 'grel): zhes ngo ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad la sogs pa'i lha rnams thams cad yid kyi dmigs te/ dang pa chen pos byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// de ltar kun rdzob kyi rnam
397b6(mdo 'grel): pa smon lam gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed // don dam pa la ni bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis bskyed par bya'o// byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o// sdom pa gsum gyi rim pa/ slob dpon tshon po rnyog mang rdo rje'i zhalas
398a1(mdo 'grel): @nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tu l+ya dA sa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA pa dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// / tod zla sa rlog pa rjon du rgya na 'anas/
398a2(mdo 'grel): kha ton dang glegs bam bklag pa'i sngon du bya ba'i cho ga/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dang po re zhig byang chub sems dpa' chos oM ba ton du bya bar 'dod pa dang / glegs bam du bya ba klog
398a3(mdo 'grel): par 'dod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/ yid kyis kun du dmigs la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyod
398a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i smon lam gyi chog/ phyag btsal ba la sogs pa yan lag bdun gyi tshul du mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod do// de'i rjes la sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag ste/ yang dag pa'i lhag
398a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i bsam pas de ltar bsams pa'i rjes la/ tshig lan gsum brjod par bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshig gcig gi don gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi yang yin na/ 'on kyang bdag ni rang
398a6(mdo 'grel): gi las kyis nyes pas shes rab chung zhing blo zhan te/ de lta yin du zin kyang / gong bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab bzung nas de bdag gi kha ten byas te/ chos kyi sgra de sems can gang gi rna lam du grags pa de/ de bzhin gshegs
398b1(mdo 'grel): 'i spobs pa thob par gyur par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos tshig gcig gi ngan gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad kyi yang yin na/ 'on kyang bdag ni rang gi las kyis nyes pas shes
398b2(mdo 'grel): chung zhing bro zhan te/ de ltar yin du zin kyang / gang bdag gis grogs bam du byas pa'i chos bklag par bya ste/ chos kyi sgra de sems can gang rnams kyi rna lam du grags pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs
398b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i skabs 'thob par gyur cig/ ces lan gsum du brjod par bya// dang glegs bam pa/ ga pa'i cho ga slo'i dben mkhas pa chen po dpal mar mi mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
399a1(mdo 'grel): ga [।]/ rgya gar skad du/ mahA yA no pa de sha g+hA Sh+TA/ bod skad du/ theg pa chen po'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa/ rje btsun ma
399a2(mdo 'grel): papham mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// rnyed dka'i dal 'byor myur du 'jig/ 'jig rten las 'bras sdug bsngal yin/ de spong stong nyid snying rje bsgom// bde gshegs bstan pa'i snying po'o// bde 'dod skyes bus bsod nams
399a3(mdo 'grel): bsags// de yang rang bzhin med par bsgom// rang bzhin med shes bsod nams mchog/ de phyir bsod nams bde ba'i rgyu// bsod nams bsags pas bde ba 'thob// de phyir mis ni bsod nams bsags// de yang
399a4(mdo 'grel): yang dang yang du bsgrub// de ring nyid nas 'dun te bsgrubs// chos kun rang sems rnam par snang // rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma med// stong nyid snying rje ro gcig thabs// de bsgom 'bras bu byang chub mchog/ sems can
399a5(mdo 'grel): kun gyi don bsgrib phyir// byang chub mchog gnyis sems bskyed de// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can// bsgom bya de 'bras sku gsum 'thob// bsam pa rin chen sems gnyis 'brel// sbyor ba dka' spyad dang len dang // rnam
399a6(mdo 'grel): ba kun tu mi dmi gso shes// gnod pas skyo med sangs rgyas sras// skye 'gag gnas med byang chub sems// rgya chen sems can don la mkhas// tshogs gnyis rgyun tshad med pa'i lam// stong pa nyid snying rje'i snying
399b1(mdo 'grel): po'o// rmi lam lta bur phyi rol min// sgyu ma lta bur bden don med// nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid bral// chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal yin// rang bzhin 'od gsal nyid las 'dir// ma skyes skye ba'i rten can gyi//
399b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems gnyis rjes 'brel pas// sems can kun don spyad par bya// dam pa gsum gyis sdig las zlog/ dri med gnyis kyis dge tshogs bsgrub// mnyam par bzhag pas rang sems gdul// bdag nyid
399b3(mdo 'grel): tshon bI'i sgrub pa'o// sems ni rtag par byang chub 'dod// bya ba lus can don la brtson// bde sdug rmi lam 'drar shes pas// mkhas pas gzhan don sgrub par byed// khrims kyis dal 'byor snying po blang // bsgrub pas bstan
399b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i snying po blang // de yi snying po gzhan don no// rtse gcig gnas pas dran pa bsten// byang chub sems kyis tshegs gnyis bsag/ ma bcos mthong bas mnyam par bzhag/ bsgrub pa'i snying po mdor bsdus pa'o// gang gi
399b5(mdo 'grel): skye dang gnas mthong ba// rmi lam mar me dag dang mtshungs// 'gro ba brdzun pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis// rigs ldan skyes bu rtag tu bslus// 'du byed gar mkhan lta bu ste// de yi rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra// mkhas pas
399b6(mdo 'grel): don kun bsgrub 'dod pas// bden gnyis mtshan nyid rtogs par byas// bya byed phra men rdzu 'phrul 'dra// 'chi bdag ri go zar chu drag bzhin// mda' sdang rmi lam dgra gnyen mtshungs// 'jigs pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho yin/
400a1(mdo 'grel): ming 'ong mi 'od rkyen gyis bsgrub// dge sdig kun slong bsam pas bsgrub/ thos pas che yi snying po byung // thams cad las kyis 'grub par 'gyur te// kye ma ngal 'byor don yod byas//
400a2(mdo 'grel): mdza' dang mi mdza' chags sdang gis// gtan sdug sdig po 'phela'agyur na// thams cing slu ba'i chos can la// kye ma yid brtan su zhig 'cha'// yid mthun tshong gro gos lta bur 'bral// mi mthun lam kha'i tshor
400a3(mdo 'grel): nga bzhin// rang sgrog bum steng bung ba 'dra// thams cad shA lam grog tshang mtshungs// legs bri shang me tog ci ltar phan// nyes spyad sbrul gdug sa ltar gdug/ kun kyang bdag stug mi 'dod na// ngal ba don med ci
400a4(mdo 'grel): tshi/ nyin mtshan smrig rgyun lci bur 'dadus// rgyu skrag nA sbyar ji bzhin 'gag/ byedade sbyor chu 'grum bye ma bzhin// kye ma ji ltar bdag 'tsho grong // 'du byed rmi la mi yul 'dra ste// mdze'i bshes srung sdeng chang glags mtshungs//
400a5(mdo 'grel): dge sdig rang lus grob mi bzhin// ci byas mi bamed tshor ba'i rgyu// gshin rje'i po nyes phyi bzhin gtugs// gnyen nor nu bran lta bur dengs// 'jig so chen g.yang sar bdag lhung na// kye ho bsod nams su zheg gas /
400a6(mdo 'grel): srid gsum sdug bsngal me 'obs 'bar// skye bo don med 'a ching bas bcings// de bas snying brtse brtson 'grus kyis// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsgrub par bya// phung po bdag mid sgyu ma 'dra// yid ni me long gzugs bzhin te/
400b1(mdo 'grel): sems can sgyu ma'i 'bras dang mtshungs// chos kun stong pa nyid shes bya// 'khrul phyir snang ba phyi rol min// sna tshogs snang phyir snang min te// shes byed mod phyir shes yang min// de phyir chos kun ston pa nyid// brna ba
400b2(mdo 'grel): tsam gyis sri da par 'phen// shesuM rab dmanA pa'i mya ngan 'da'// de phyir phan tshun mAny+tsa mi ldan+do pas/ rgyal bas bla med lim du gsungs// nyin mtshan sbeng med ris 'jog 'gro'adi skyon med rtag tu 'bring // gzhan du'ang
400b3(mdo 'grel): cir 'gyur gang ngas med na// 'chi tshe bdag yid ji ltar bde// gang bsogs bung ba'i ci ltar 'dir// gnyen sdug sbrul tshang bya khyud bzhin// bdag cig ya nga'i thang la rgyug/ kyi hud de bzod dka'i tshar bas 'jigs// mi sdug
400b4(mdo 'grel): gshin+da d+ha'i po sa bdud // yid 'ong gnyen dang bshes pas spangs// skyabs gcig bsod nams rgyang bsrings nis// de tshe gonas skabs ci 'dra zhig/ di ring nyid kyang 'chi sring na// lo brgyar bde bar gnas sam+b+ha tsi// nams
400b5(mdo 'grel): nga mi sde gro 'gyur gyis// bdag don bdag gis bsrub par gyis// 'di la mi 'jigs su'ang med// 'jigs nas gdengs thob ci 'ang men// gangangs drod dge las gzhan med na// ci phyir bdag yid bde bar 'dug
400b6(mdo 'grel): sngon chang me myang bde sdug med// gang myong de la snying pa med// kye marmi lam sgyu 'bras bslus// da ni bla ma'i bka' bsgrub rigs// ji lta ji ltar snags spyad yul gang snang ba// rgyal sras spyod che yul dus nga ba de ma
401a1(mdo 'grel): bsgom// de lta de ltar mnyam nyid 'gro'o med gnas nas// sems can don brtson tshogs gnyis 'du byed mkhas par 'gyur// gson tshe n+d+ha rtse'i zil pa 'dra// pha rol la yang shin tu nye//
401a2(mdo 'grel): gcig phur gar 'gro nges med de// thams cad sla ba'i chos can nyid// bdag gis bdag don ma bsams na// nyin mtshan don med 'da' bar zad// mi dge spyad pas sdug bsngal 'byung // de bas bag yod brtson par rigs
401a3(mdo 'grel): ma thob thob na 'a snyam sems// thob nas cung zad cis kyang skyo// mi skye na'ang chog shes med // chog shes gang med dbul po yin// dbul pos 'byor pa'i cho ga mi shes// phyug po rgyal pos chog mi shes// rgyal po
401a4(mdo 'grel): lha yi dbang phyug 'dod// des kyang me tshul s+t+wa~M 'dod// gos med tshe no gos 'dod de// gos thob gos zas mang po 'dod// des kyang mi tshig de bzhin du// rgyal yul sogs kyi gos gzhan tshol// nor med tshon nor
401a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod de// gcig gis mi chog khri phyag tshol// de rnyed na yang pa du sha'i// rta glang gser ri la sogs 'dod // gcig thob brgya 'dod brgya rnyed na// stong 'dod de yi mi chog ste// gnyis 'gyur de bzhin sum 'gyur dang //
401a6(mdo 'grel): brgya 'gyur la sogs 'dod me mnyen// 'i phyir gang la chog shes yod// de la nor rnams thams cad yod// gang la de med thams cad med// phyug po dbul po'i khyad par ci// dbul po cung zad dngos pos phongs// cung zad
401b1(mdo 'grel): thob na'ang che thob sems// phyug po chog med med pos phongs// chen po rnyed kyang chung ngur sems// srid la yid skyo nges 'byung chug/ bdag 'dul sangs rgyas bstan pa'i srog/ 'chi bdag mi bzang dgra bo'i sde// pha rol don
401b2(mdo 'grel): shes rnyed pa'i mchog/ bag byed khrel yod chos 'dul yin// rang blo rang sbyang lhag pa'i sems// phyi nang stong shos shes rab ste// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sgrol ba'i gru/ bstan rtsa bslab pa bsrung 'dod pas// 'bad pas kun
401b3(mdo 'grel): gyis sems bsrung bya// bslab pa me bsrungs lus den ci// sems ma bsrungs na ches don med// rang sems rang gis bsrung 'ad na// gsung bral mtshan ma med bsgom bya// sprul pa lta bu'i dran pa yis// thams cad
401b4(mdo 'grel): 'a'adang bsrung bar gyis// bdag gi mnyam nyid rang bzhin te// yang dag drin shes bsrung ba'i mchog/ gang gi lus sems sgyu 'drar ni// gnas nas yang yang mnyam gzhag bya// sdig byas 'bras bu rnam gsum ste/
401b5(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal chu bo'i rgyun bzhin 'bab// sna tshogs 'jigs pa char bzhin te// mi 'dod nyis grib 'dra'o// yid 'ong tho ba dang dug rgyun 'phel// gang dag gags 'gro mdun snying dong // de dang der song 'dod
401b6(mdo 'grel): dgu gisum// 'di dge bsod nams mchod 'is 'bras// sa byon pa'i sangs rgyas chos rdo shAkya shrIs yul 'khor so ser byan pa'inu ba pa rnams kyi skal sbyar te zher byang du brtsams
402a1(mdo 'grel): shing gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa kha 'thor ba rnams rdzogs so// / dpal sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang
402a2(mdo 'grel): bral ba'i mtha ba d+hi cing dang / mi m+bu'i byams pa la gyis 'gyur bkra shis danar/
402a3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams stongs rgyas gyim mcher mar byar batshwa ba yiyi// bas dumar bsags pa'i thig sgri ma lus can// ngage 'dis dun 'a ga kre du mas bcom pa bzhin// ring ci byang chub b+hi bar gro 'bar gyur bas nan/ sa mi dang blta bas sngo gsum cig brim gyi smon lam ga' 'o//
